Summary: Always have positive experience stay at Hampton Inn - very clean, excellent breakfast buffet, very friendly staff.  Stayed last weekend at Hampton Inn Irvine East - Lake Forest with an excellent experience as usual.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest and posting your review on TripAdvisor!  Your review will be shared with my team so they can see that their hard work and dedication to our guests do not go unnoticed.  We look forward to welcoming you back to us!

Summary: Close to freeway. About 15min from Great Park Rink in Irvine which is the reason we were in town (WHL prospects camp). Close to several restaurants & stores.  25min ish from Laguna Beach. Staff was very friendly. No complaints.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your review on your experience with us! I'm happy to see that the services and amenities we offered exceeded your expectations. Our location is close to the Great Park in Irvine as well as many popular sights in Orange County.  We look forward to having you back with us on your next trip to Sunny Southern California!

Summary Heading: Functional, bland mid chain establishment, basic breakfast, unreliable WiFi.
Summary: A rather uninspirning hotel, nothing bad, but nothing that great either. Dull, bland decor throughout a bit off the larger roads so a quiet nights sleep, rooms adequate. Breakfast was basic, warm oatmeal, scrambled eggs and a different heavily over processed meat each day - it the sum total of warm offerings apart from toast/bagels & DIY waffles. No real service and the WiFI was very unreliable.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback regarding your stay experience.  We are sorry that we did not exceed your expectations.  We will continually work hard to meet that goal.  I hope we are given an opportunity to serve you again in the future

Summary: Unless you have a reason to be in Irvine or Lake Forest, there is nothing there.  We stayed here to be between San Diego and LA to fly out to Hawaii.  It was easy getting to San Diego and back to LAX. Enjoy
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback.  I am happy to see that our location was easy for you to get to San Diego and back to LAX.  We look forward to welcoming you back with us!

Summary: Close to restaurants. Has a small pool. Good breakfast and coffee. In Orange County. View of mountains. The Mission Veijo YMCA took my TX membership. Clean place, friendly staff. Had refrigerator. Sunny Southern California!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your review on your experience with us!  I'm happy to see that the services and amenities we offered exceeded your expectations.  We look forward to having you back with us on your next trip to Sunny Southern California!

Summary: Whenever I come to town to visit family, I plan to stay at this hotel due to its convenient location to family, the way the staff is so attentive and accommodating and the cleanliness of the grounds and rooms. On my last stay, I had an unplanned vehicle repair and after I had left the hotel, I called the desk and asked if they could extend my room for me for another night even though I was set to check out. They only asked that I come in to the desk and pick up new keys since my old ones had been inactivated. The maid provided us with clean towels at my request and, even though I told her not to bother making the bed, she did a complete room set up for us. When I return to the area, if it is for more than a day, I will continue stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and staying with us!  I am delighted to see that the attentiveness of my team has exceeded your expectations.  My team works hard everyday to ensure the experience of our guests is the priority.  We look forward to welcoming you back to us!

Summary Heading: Not the usual quality of Hampton Inn
Summary: Disappointed with this location Remote in room was filthy. Attitude of desk clerk was condescending, there was no manager on duty to speak with to ask for help. Breakfast staff and night clerks were kind and helpful.  Rooms are really worn, hotel rooms are tired and need some refurbishing.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback regarding your experience with us.  I apologize for the attitude of the desk clerk and having no Manager on Duty when we couldn't accommodate your request for a late checkout.  While we try to accommodate every request a guest asks of us, but at times we simply can't.  Your feedback is important to us.  We are constantly trying to improve ourselves to better serve our guests.

Summary: Great hotel, not too big. Very service oriented employees.  Barbara at the Breakfast is fantastic, very cordial, very helpful, even removes plates when you are done if she has the time. Candy at the front desk was very helpful and accommodating and took care of a glitch in our reservation.  The maids for the rooms were also very good and always greeted you when walking past them.  If there is a problem it's with the elevator which is a slow one, although it gets you to your floor. I highly recommend this hotel for short or long stays. It is very close to a shopping center with good restaurants, In & Out Burger, Islands, Red Robin, Dollar store, Walmart, Hobby Lobby, Target and many more.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with other travelers.  Barbara is truly a gem and Candy is always friendly and helpful.  Our staff works very hard to ensure our guests are treated like family.  We look forward to having you back home with us in the future!

Summary: I stay at this Hampton Inn occasionally on business trips.  I consistently have a great stay, and the service is always outstanding.  I especially like the breakfast, and the lady who is in charge of it is phenomenal.  Makes everyone feel welcome.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback from a great stay with us!  Barbara is truly an asset to our hotel and everyone loves her.  We look forward to welcoming you home to us for many years to come.

Summary: Great room. Clean. Love Hampton Inn’s for their reliable service and quality. We spent two nights. Upon arrival there was the usual cookies, hot chocolate and fruits that my kids love. The workout room was small, but nice equipment.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your review on TripAdvisor!  Hampton Inn's are consistent in delivering what travelers have come to expect throughout the years.  I am happy to see that your stay with us was as expected.  We hope to see you again!

Summary: The city of Lake Forest is beautiful. I love Hampton Inns for their early (6:00 am) full complimentary breakfasts, free parking, clean facilities, and affordable rates. This Hampton Inn is in a beautiful city, in a nice location. You may want to tell your GPS to avoid Toll Roads, since there is one right next to the hotel. I paid $3.50, when I didn't need to, because I wasn't aware of it. On the way out, I took a different road. The carpet in our room could use replacing, but everything else was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback regarding the stay experience you had with us.  Our hotel is an excellent choice for distinguished travelers seeking complimentary breakfast, clean rooms, competitive rates, and high service standards.  We are located next to Toll Road 241 which saves you a lot of time when traveling throughout Orange County, but at a cost.  We look forward to welcoming you back to our beautiful city!

Summary: Very nice place to stay. People were friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Service was above expectations. Area was newer, more suburban than urban. There were business people during the week and more families on the weekend.
Manager Response: Hello sniksah,  So very nice to have served you and thank you for pointing out Barbara. Yes she does a fine job of welcoming Guests. I was also happy to have helped you with the elevator - my pleasure. I am so happy that you had a great stay and that you enjoyed your room.  Looking forward to serving you again.  Mike S.

Summary: We were greeted by staff, numerous times, during our stay, They offered to help us with luggage, early check in and even invited us to relax and have breakfast, while our room was getting ready.  The breakfast was wonderful.  The rooms were clean and comfortable.  The bathroom was immaculate.  They even had handicap accessibility to the pool.  The  workout room had extra amenities.  The best thing was the friendliness of every staff member that we interacted with.  This truly was the best Hampton Inn we have ever stayed at.
Manager Response: Hello Carolyn L,  We are so happy to hear how well we treated you - that's what you should expect from us. Thank you for pointing this out. I'm so glad we have met all of your expectations and then some! We really so appreciate the time you took to give us this 5-star review.  Looking forward to serving you again.  Mike S.

Summary: Clean hotel ina good location very convienent.  Staff needs to be more attentive during checkin and resolving challenges.  I could have stayed at another Hilton property with better amenities in the same area.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback regarding your stay with us.  I am sorry that the staff wasn't up to par with resolving challenges.  The issues you have described will be used to further train the team as we are consistently looking for ways to improve.  I hope you will give us another opportunity in the future to serve you again.!

Summary Heading: Clean, Friendly and in a safe area
Summary: This was my first time staying at this hotel.  The staff was friendly, polite and seemed happy to be working there.  The location was near many accommodations such as restaurants , gas and grocery stores (many within a mile).  Location was a bit out of the way from Irvine where I was working.  Should indicate that tolls may be required to get there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your experience with us.  Our hotel is in a secluded and quiet area, but also close to restaurants and shopping outlets.  While the toll road is adjacent to the hotel, we are only a few miles from the 405 and 5 Freeways.  We look forward to welcoming you home on your next trip out to Orange County.

Summary: As a Hilton Honors member I frequently stay at several Hilton properties, and although this Hampton is older than the other hotels I stay, it's my favorite. The front desk - Rich (?) and Ryan - are the perfect example of customer service and the property has a very homey feel to it. The location is excellent as well. Tons of nearby restaurants and hiking options. But again - the staff is what has us coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your experience with us at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Irvine East/Lake Forest and for being a Hilton Honors member.  Your comments will be shared with Rick and Ryan about the level of service they are providing for our guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back home with us for many years to come!

Summary Heading: worst Hilton property I’ve ever stayed in. Period.
Summary: Room was horribly out of date, peeling/cracked paint, poor maintenance, corroded fixtures, broken AC access box. ‘Motel 6 circa 1984’. I would never stay there again, I would not only never recommend this property, I will warn others about it. I literally can’t believe this is a Hilton property... More like a cheap slum lords flop house... just shameful.Takes a lot to get me to write a review... People need to be warned. I felt ripped off.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your experience with us at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I appreciate you taking the time to write such a descriptive review and apologize for not being able to provide the level of service and conditions you have come to expect.  I am confident that the experience you had is isolated as we have many positive reviews regarding the condition of the hotel and the service standards we provide.

Summary: This hotel fit our needs and satisfaction. Location of hotel was great, complimentary breakfast was awesome especially because we have kids. Clean room and comfy bed. A double plus because a refrigerator and microwave were provided in your room.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your experience with us at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I am happy to see that our hotel fitted your needs and satisfaction.  Our location and amenities offered are ideal for sporting tournaments around the area.  If there is any room for us to improve on, please let us know!

Summary: The hotel was fine, the staff, especially the breakfast attendant, were great, but what I really appreciated was there's a hiking/biking/walking/running trail right off the parking lot. seemed a little expensive but I really didn't compare.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback.  The amenities we offer and great service by our staff is consistent with a hotel bearing the Hilton brand.  We look forward to welcoming you back with us!

Summary: I have already submitted my review. The experience at the end of breakfast kind of spoiled the rest of the review as that was my last experience. I think the rooms are a bit overpriced , but that is the way it is
Manager Response: Dear kangenwater4u2,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and for staying with us. We'll try to be more conscious of the programming offered in the public areas and ask if you are okay with it. We hope the remainder of your stay was good. I enjoyed talking with you as well.   We look forward to serving you again and Happy New Year.  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We have had near perfect experiences at this hotel. Breakfast is yummy and free (sausage, scrambled eggs, decent tasting pastries!).  Bed is very comfy and great on the back. Fridge in room was actually cold!, and kept our food/drinks cold. Microwave and Keurig in room which we did not use. Good A/C and quiet neighbors.  Our only issues were that there is limited seating during breakfast (it gets super full during certain times), the couch in our room had some specks of food or lint or something of that nature, and the hotel lobby is pretty boring (no place to hang out or explore other than your room).  This is a great hotel for exploring Lake Forest and Irvine. Lots of convenience stores and restaurants nearby.  We like returning to this hotel!
Manager Response: Hello JN_WorldTravelers,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I'm so happy your bed was comfy - that usually makes the day great! Other than the immediate seating area at breakfast, you are always more than welcome to sit poolside or even in the lobby to enjoy your food. We are also central to museums, parks, Disneyland and all points north and south.  We look forward to serving you again when you return to our area.  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We were only in town for the night but since I lived in the area for years, I drove by this hotel frequently and knew it was in a great location for us. Clean, comfortable, spacious room and a very decent breakfast. Great value.
Manager Response: Hello Getaway38310584049,  Thank you for thinking of us! We appreciate the 5-stars and your great compliments. We are central to many highways, shopping and dining options and so happy that it all worked out well for you. Hope to serve you again.  Mike S.

Summary: Our stay at this hotel was more than we anticipated. Very clean and comfortable rooms. Our room had all the necessities of home, which made packing that much easier. The hotel staff was also very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Hello Discover24603290280,  I'm so happy that your couples getaway went so well! We do make it a point to keep many different amenities on hand, in the event something was left behind at home. As you experienced, we even include breakfast and wi-fi. Everything complimentary to further emphasize a great stay.  Thank you for the 5-stars!  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Hampton over Christmas, first in the two queen bed room and then in the king bed room.  The queen beds were more like doubles.  The king was bigger but still uncomfortable.  Breakfast was ok with eggs, bacon, a waffle maker, cereal, fresh fruit and yogurt.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your experience while staying with us at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I am sorry to hear that the bedding and breakfast weren't to your satisfaction.  My team will continue to work harder to ensure every guest has an awesome stay with us.  Happy New Year!

Summary: This Hampton Inn is very typical of the rest. It has all the usual amenities. Pool, spa, breakfast lounge with TV, Our room had a microwave and a refrigerator.  Now, we've stayed at a lot of hotels, and the refrigerator and/or the air conditioning is always noisy. Not the case here. Both were nice and quiet. And the big pet peeve for me is the door closer. Every hotel seems to have no idea you can adjust the door closer so the door does not slam. Every hotel, except three that I have found. This hotel is one of them. Our door closed exactly like it should. Smoothly and quietly. Nicely done Hampton Inn.
Manager Response: Hello Rick C,  Thank you for your encouraging words - that's very nice to hear. We're happy you had a good visit and welcome you back. We look forward to serving you again.  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Hotel for first night in LA
Summary: Hilton properties have increased prices and added parking charges at most LAX hotel. This Hampton Inn still has free parking but it’s 50 miles from LAX and you get hit for tolls on the roads in from LAX. It’s a nice property with great staff and close to Irvine Towne Centre with loads of eating and shopping options. Great breakfast.
Manager Response: Hello motorcar1,  So nice to have served you here. Yes a bit of drive from LAX but John Wayne airport is also close by. By the way, you can still get around by-passing the toll roads. We're a short drive to multiple interstates via city streets. Our parking is complimentary and we want you to stay!   Thank you again,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Location was a key driver for my selection of this Hampton Inn.  It is the Hilton standard design.   My biggest "yes" moment was the friendliness of the staff.  My biggest "No" was the cheap towels.  Breakfast had nice waffle maker and selection of fruits.
Manager Response: Hi SlickEagle,  Thanks for taking time to review and complimenting our staff. We have happy people working here. Sounds like some old towels fell into circulation as we recently replaced ALL towels in the hotel. Sorry about that. Hope to see you again.  Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I stay at this hotel for 1 week in feb and 1 week in sept every year. I've never had any issues.  I even forgot a jacket in sept and it was still there in feb when I came back! Quiet and clean.  Would definitely recommend
Manager Response: Hi lzdday,  I'm so happy that you return a couple of times per year and that your visits are always great! Thank you for the great review - we really do appreciate it. Hope to see you again in February!  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Each member of their team was pleasant and very helpful.  They took care of my concerns immediately, greeted me each time I passed through the lobby, and even the breakfast server greeted me and said goodbye as I checked out.  Very friendly staff!  The room was clean and comfortable.  The location is very easy to get to with plenty of parking.  Many restaurants, stores and entertainment options nearby.
Manager Response: Hi CaboMom711,  I'm so happy you had a great visit. We do place emphasis on our Guests, as this is more than a job to us - thank you for noticing. As you've seen, our location is central to many shopping, dining and highway options. We look forward to serving you again.  Thank you for this great review, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: And ANOTHER Great Stay at Hampton Inn, Lake Forest..!!!
Summary: We have been coming to Hampton Inn, Lake Forest for the past 7 years. Every stay is memorable and the accommodations are fantastic. From the GREAT breakfast provided by Barbara to the friendliness and high level of service you receive from the staff, you won't be disappointed. My wife and I can't wait to return. We often say to each other "We need a Hampton Inn sleep..!!!" The beds are SO comfy. Thank you Hampton Inn, Lake Forest..!!!! We'll see you again soon..!!!
Manager Response: Hi Barry B,  Wow! I am so, so happy that your stay was not just excellent, but that you return because it always is. Barbara is a gem and thanks for complimenting her and our staff - we work very hard to please you. Whenever I stay at a Hampton Inn in my personal travels, I too sleep well.   Thank you again, we look forward to serving you next year.  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Very helpful staff.  Comfortable beds.  Quiet and restful stay. Given the quality of the breakfast and the cost of other hotels in the area, I would consider this Hampton Inn a very good value. We have stayed here twice with the same good experience.
Manager Response: Hello James L,  Such a pleasure to have served you! Thank you for the compliments to our staff - happy to have you here.  Thanks, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Easy check-in/check-out. The sheets kept coming off the bed. There were no towels at the pool. There was no toilet paper in the women's main bathroom. Nice breakfast. Left with many bites, can't say 100% it was from the room but where else would they come from? This is Socal, not Texas. The pool was so warm it was not refreshing. Elevator was old, slow and noisy. Interior hallways not a/c and uncomfortable. Bed was not comfortable and room temperature fluctuated quite a bit. Not worth the $199 rate
Manager Response: Hi PeteJ,  Thank you so much for your response and bringing these items to my attention. I am so sorry that you suffered bites. Upon being alerted, we did immediately dispatch a third party to investigate the room. Fortunately, there was no presence of pest activity and they left documentation for such. I can say that there is a lot of "brush" outside the hotel; but, can only guess that played a part of it. Please don't think my delayed response to your review was a delayed response to addressing the issues internally.   Glad you enjoyed breakfast. I'm also happy that check-in/check-out was easy.  Thank you, Mike S.

Summary: The hotel was clean and the staff kept my room tidy. I used the elliptical machine at the fitness center, which was nearly empty and very available. In particular, Noelle P. at the bar was a great server and delightful human with whom I enjoyed watching and discussing the film Casino for the millionth time in the evening before my flight home.
Manager Response: Hi cknafelz,  Thank you for taking the time to review. We appreciate the 5 stars - our staff will be happy to see this!  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: uncomfortable bedding sheets Bottom sheet was not a fitted sheet Kept rising We have been Hilton Honors members for > than 20 years and not welcomed by the front desk. We were very disappointed in our stay.
Manager Response: Hello H6198XTmichaelc,  Thank you for taking the time to review. I am so sorry that we fell below our usual Hilton standards - there is simply no excuse. Your bedding linens should have fitted properly on the mattress and I apologize for the inconvenience. I'm also very disappointed in the lack of warmth and welcome you would expect from a Hilton property, as an Honors member, that you did not receive from us.  I appreciate the comments and will share with our Team - Housekeeping and our Front Desk. Again thank you for being a Hilton Honors member and I hope you will consider staying with us again.  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Staying there over the weekend as our last stop at L.A. this year.  The local area is quiet, clean and have a very safe feeling.  We arrived a bit early from Dana Point and the room is not available but Michael is very helpful and kind enough to allow us storing all our luggage at their office so we could head out to Irvine Spectrum for lunch and shopping.  The room looks like just did some renovation and you could easy tell the bathroom and vinyl wall covering is newer and the doors, electrical outlet plate are older but the room is very clean and well maintained.  During our short stay, Tim at the Front Desk answered all our questions with a bright smile which made our stay an even better one, thank you.  Would definitely recommend anyone looking for at a quiet, comfortable
Manager Response: Hi Mazda626,  I am so happy that you had an excellent stay. Thanks for all of your wonderful comments and compliments on our property and staff. Our location is central to everything you need - multiple highways, dining and shopping options. In addition, we're about half way between San Diego and Los Angeles, yet just enough out of the way to give you a quiet, relaxing stay.  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The staff were fabulous in every way, rooms were clean, breakfast was okay, had a clogged toilet and they were there within five minutes of our calling the front desk.  Awesome customer service and great folks running the place.
Manager Response: Hi T5805ZL,  Thank you so much for your great comments on our staff! They will absolutely love hearing about your review. I'm also happy that we were able to resolve the toilet issue quickly. We hope to see you again soon - our doors are always open to you!  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: hotel is clean, beds are new and comfortable. Their breakfast area is clean and well maintenance with supplies...menu is not the greatest but will do for small kids; it comes with scramble eggs, sausage, waffles, cereal, milk, coffee, muffins and toast.
Manager Response: Hello janetnavarr0,  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to review our hotel - 5 stars - love it! We work hard to maintain a clean property and our Team will be so excited to hear about your comments. Our breakfast menu is simple - but that makes life easier on you when you bring the kids.  We hope to see you again next year - or sooner!  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The staff exceeded my expectations with accommodations and service! Room was tidy and fresh! The location was convenient and overall the hotel was quiet. We didn’t use the pool but it appeared sparkling and clean with many visitors enjoying the water.
Manager Response: Hello caligrl2012,  Thank you so much for the 5 stars! Our Team will be excited to see this. We're so happy you had a great stay and we do look forward to serving you again.  Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed here for my daughters lacrosse tournament, the staff was helpful at check in and check out. They were friendly and helpful during breakfast and any time we were coming and going. The rooms were clean and comfortable, we were very happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you so much for staying with us. I'm so happy you had a great visit and thanks for complementing our staff. We look forward to serving you again.  Mike S. Guest Ralations Manager

Summary Heading: Adequate high-priced hotel, but great location
Summary: This hotel was a standard Hampton with a great location if you are staying in the Lake Forest area and have a car to drive around. (Not a lot within walking distance.) Breakfast with fine, but pretty minimal. Wifi was good. Service was excellent. My only complaint is the value... it's an expensive hotel for a basic Hampton Inn experience.  I guess you're paying for location?? All in all, good stay, though after having driven around all week, I might try to find a cheaper stay outside of Lake Forest, perhaps in Irvine or Mission Viejo.
Manager Response: Hello  jpierce121,  Thank you for taking the time to review. We're happy our property served your needs well. While there are some dining options with in walking distance, you are correct there are many more dining and shopping options about a mile and half away - thus requiring your car. Thanks for the compliments on our service - we work very hard for this and our staff will appreciate that you've noticed.  We are looking forward to serving you again.  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I had the worst stay at this hotel! The front desk people were fabulous but the toilet would not flush a simple round of TP, no towels upon arrival, and the mattress sucked so bad I am visiting a physiatrist in Monday! And to say the least 185.00 a night for a Hampton was ridiculous Hilton Honors is going to hear about this!
Manager Response: Hello J5606NNcheryls,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am so sorry that you had these issues in your room. Toilets should flush properly and mattresses should be comfy. Great news that the Front Desk staff took good care of you. While it doesn't change things we know that we need to address maintenance issues and compliment our staff.  Thank you,  Mike S.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn never lets me down
Summary: Because of the caring friendly staff there and the comfort of the room and the heated pool and delicious free breakfast this this location was the best so far.  Plus they are children friendly which made it even better. I think these guys have it figured out whether business or pleasure or both The Hampton Inn is the perfect place tto stay
Manager Response: Hi grammondello56,  We are so happy this has become a home for you, where people are friendly and the food is good. Thanks for the compliments. We look forward to serving you again.  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This hotel is tops! Excellent from top to bottom. Breakfast is great and it's a real breakfast. Recommend this hotel! I will be back. Staff was OUTSTANDING! Parking is very good with a gas station close by. Good location and your next to the freeway.
Manager Response: Hello wschoonm,  I'm so happy that your stay was excellent! Our staff really do appreciate your kind words - I'll be sure to let them know. You are right - we're in a good location near many shopping, dining and freeway options.  Looking forward to serving you again.  Thank you,  Mike S. Gust Relations Manager

Summary: I originally booked a reservation for 2 nights at this property. When I went to check in there were two ladies standing at the front desk and looked to be complaining about some sort of bug issue in their room? This was kind of alarming but I just brushed it off and continued to check in.   Check in process was smooth and the GSR was very friendly. After we got our keys we went up to find a very run down room. The thermostat was very crooked and the space made me feel very uncomfortable. After hearing the ladies talk about bug and then seeing the condition of the room I immediately called the front desk to check out the next day.   Breakfast area was very small but the attendant was extremely friendly and the food was great.   Altogether, the staff was great but the rooms were
Manager Response: Hello kristin k,  Thank you for visiting our property and taking the time to write. I'm sorry that your room made you feel uncomfortable. As a new Manager at this location, the first task on our list is inspecting every room to ensure that they do not look run down. We are making any needed corrections to the rooms as fast as we can move. I would have also left if I didn't like the feel of the room.   Thank you for complimenting our staff - that's nice to hear. We hope to see you on your next visit. If you let me know you are coming, I'll ensure your stay is just right.   Warm Regards,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Newer property...clean and comfortable also very quiet...only complaints are no water pressure and the tub/shower took over 20 minutes to drain...also heavy on the sir freshener....my favorite was the bathroom door that opened up into the room guaranteeing someone would walk into it during the night....sigh
Manager Response: Hello Kathleen L,  Thank you for visiting our property. We are set in a quieter part of town, against the foothills but maintaining access to everything - shopping, dining, multiple highways. Sorry about the maintenance issues - particularly the door. I assure you that I am addressing this with my staff and thank you for letting me know.  Hope to serve you again.  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This was our first time staying at a Hampton and I'm so glad we made this choice. It was clean, comfortable, good wifi access, and the breakfast had so many good choices. The staff was so friendly and helpful. We had a great time staying here!
Manager Response: Hello poughzp,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review! I am very happy that we took such good care of you. Hope to serve you again soon.  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Clean & Near lots of shopping & restaurants.
Summary: We stayed here as a team for a basketball tournament.  Easy access to & from location of tournament. Breakfast was good & easily accessable to everyone. My only complaint is that the elevator is slow & there is only 1.  There is a Hilton Garden Inn right next door that is a little nicer & has a bar & restaurant, but they close at 10 PM.
Manager Response: Hello blonde95,  I'm so happy that our location worked so well for you - we are central to multiple highways so it makes life easier. I agree about the elevator, I wish it was a bit faster too - sorry about that.  Hope to serve you again.  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Easy to find, plenty of parking, clean room, breakfast not that great
Summary: Had a stay here after a client moved nearby and this hotel was only about 3 blocks away. Booking was easy, checkin was easy online and was able to select my room.  Rooms are all very similar so no Gold status room upgrade was offered to my knowledge. Arrival was easy, as was the complimentary parking.  Staff quickly welcomed me. Right after I arrived the fire alarm went off... so that was a little loud.  Other than that, the room was quite and just fine.  It was clean.  I don't think I found any errant hairs so thats always comforting. My only somewhat disappointing thing during my visit was the breakfast.  The eggs and sausage just didn't look very good, so I skipped those.  Had a waffle which was fine.  Nothing too special there but not outright bad either.  I'd probably
Manager Response: Dear travelinpdx,  Thank you for staying with us at our hotel. We appreciate your honest review of our property and are glad you had a good stay overall. We’ll address your comments with our breakfast team to ensure we’re providing the best start to your morning possible. Thank you again, and we hope you’ll visit us in the future.

Summary Heading: Not a clean place to stay

Summary: I just want to say this is a great family friendly place.. everyone was so awesome and they were always willing to help. Bryan at the front desk was so attentive to help us check in on time. And a plus is that breakfast is really good! The lady at the breakfast area kept everything looking delicious and clean! I definitely would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we are very lucky to have both Bryan & Barbara as team members, they both enjoy sharing Hamptonality with our guests. We look forward to your next visit with us an hope to see you soon!  Thank you,

Summary: Very pleasant staff. Easy to access location. Clean, but dated room. Light over mirror wasn't working, and not addressed during my three day stay, even though brought to attention of desk staff. Toiletries not refreshed each day, and when refreshed, didn't include everything. Quiet workspace and nothing to interrupt a good night sleep. Budget friendly for the area.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us, we were sorry to hear that your stay was less than favorable. Our property was partially renovated March of 2015, and we are very surprised to hear about your experience. We do hope that you continue to stay with Hilton, and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Hampton front desk staff did not provide the quality service I expected. As a Hilton diamond member, I expected a quality service. I have a long history of stays as a member but I wasn't treated like the other Hilton Hotels.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we were very sorry to hear that your arrival was not exceptional.  As you can read from previous reviews, this is not typical of and we hope this would be an isolated incident.  We do thank you for being a valued Hilton Honors Diamond Member.  We look forward to your next visit and I personally would like to handle your next reservation.

Summary: My family and I  came here to get away for the day. We had fun in the pool. My kids swam for 2 hours and slept all night. It made for a nice change. In the morning, we sat down to a wonderful complimentary breakfast. The staff was friendly and answered any questions that came up. Our stay was nice and quiet.
Manager Response: Weekend get-a-ways are great!  We were glad you stayed with us, and the kid were able to enjoy the pool.  We look forward to your next visit and the opportunity to share more of our Hamptonality.  See you soon!

Summary: Travel on business to the area - well located with easy access road access that quickly gets you to the interstates and highways. Going west you quickly are out of the city and into the beginnings of mountains.  Staff was friendly, when I checked in they had cookies just coming out the oven.  Breakfast was good and I enjoyed sitting by the pool - even in December it was nice. Although I did get a couple apologies for the weather. (Partly cloudy and temperatures in the 60's - heaven for-fend.:-) )  Enjoyed my stay and will go back when in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your business, we appreciate your valued loyalty to Hilton- Hampton Inn.  We were glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to sharing our Hamptonality on your next visit.  See you soon.

Summary: The Hampton Inn at Foothill Ranch, CA is truly our "Home Away From Home". Stayed several times, and they never let us down. Truly Wonderful and Warm feeling at every stay. Entire Staff, is always very accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, we enjoying sharing our Hamptonality with our guests and truly appreciate your loyalty.  We look forward to your next visit with us and thank you for choosing Hampton Inn.

Summary: Great location close to major highways, yet on a quiet street.  Facilities are newer, clean, and well kept.  The pool looked nice (a bit too cold to swim) and the workout room had good treadmills and bikes.  Complimentary breakfast was good, and there was a lot to choose from.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your wonderful experience with us, we are very lucky to be located in such a great area.  Not only are we near major highways but shopping a short drive away including the Irvine Spectrum.  We were very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We were visiting in Southern Cal and stayed at this hotel for a couple of nights. This place is clean with very helpful staff. Rooms are not new but very clean and in good order. The Breakfast are and food were good. The surrounding are feel safe with another Hilton property next door.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we hope you enjoyed your stay and will return on your next visit to Foothill Ranch.  Thank you again for your kind words and we hope to share our Hamptonality with you again soon.

Summary: My aunt and I were traveling around Southern California and spent a night at this nice hotel within the Hilton brand. It was new, clean and nicely decorated. We joked with the staff that of all places we visited they had the best steering luggage carts, but it really was true. Everything seemed well maintained and the staff was polite, cheerful and very helpful.   The free breakfast at Hamptons are always nice and this one was as well. The lady maintaining the breakfast area was particularly nice and was continually cleaning, restocking and offering to get guests whatever they might need.  Although the rooms at this chain are a little tighter than some of the Hilton chains, you won't mind it for the great deal you'll get here.
Manager Response: We thank you for your kind words and for choosing Hampton Inn Foothill Ranch. We are delighted to hear that your stay was a pleasant one and we look forward to your next visit.  We thank you for your loyalty to Hilton and  for allowing us to share our Hamptonality.

Summary: I have issue to resolve with management and lawyer. (See below)  I checked in on Monday (11/28). I found a bedbug walking around the pillow. After killing it, I slept wearing full cloth on me. Next day (11/29), I found another bedbug moving around on the bed. I killed it and took a picture of it. I could not stay in the room like last night, so I asked the front desk to change my room. They had no room available so they relocated me to Hilton Garden Inn.  Hampton Inn did not charge the first night but Garden Inn charged the room for second night. I deserve full refund for both nights (Monday and Tuesday).   One thing that made me mad was that Manager in Hampton was not able to reach on the phone. Left a message for call back but never got the call back. I will report this hotel
Manager Response: It was great to speaking with you and glad to hear that you were pleased to hear that after our 3rd party investigation concluded there was no pest activity in our guest room. I also thank you for allowing us an opportunity to restore your faith with Hilton and Hampton family. We look forward to your next visit and thank you for being a valued Hilton Honors member.

Summary: A pleasant lodging, great weather, good staff, and located in a great spot for shoppers and diners.  It just needs a bar to be top rate. A great fitness room, always coffee, good walking area.  On the downside, it gets a bit expensive during the week!
Manager Response: We thank you for choosing us for your Thanksgiving Holiday visit, we appreciate your kind words and we all were happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  We are very lucky to be located in a nice area with local restaurants, and shopping center near by.  We look forward to your next visit, to Foothill Ranch.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel with Great Service & Ammenities
Summary: Friendly welcome.  Very Helpful Staff.  Clean Room.  Kudos to Barbara in the Breakfast Service Area.  She not only was gracious, anxious to be helpful, but came to my rescue BIG TIME with a warm smile & outgoing personality.  She went above & beyond each day we stayed.  What a comfort.  Recommend her for honors!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience, with us we are very lucky to have team members like Barbara.  We excited to hear when our guests enjoy their stay and our Hamptonality.  We thank you again for your kind words and we look forward to your next visit. See you soon. :)

Summary Heading: Nice hotel BUT...check-in not so much
Summary: First, this is a nice Hampton Inn and very well located. But, the HH digital check-in left a lot to be desired. We checked in on line at 11:19am and chose room 317 because we wanted to be on the top floor so there was no noise above us. We arrived at 4:30 pm and were told our room was not ready. REALLY? Our pre-selected room was not ready an hour and a half after normal check-in. So, they gave us 217. The second night a girls soccer team was at the hotel and were apparently given our original room and there was stomping going on up there. We tried to call the desk, but the phone did not work! Oh, well. They did get the noise stopped after I got dressed and went to the desk.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we sincerely apologize for your arrival experience.  We do thank you for being loyal Hilton Honors Members and we do thank you for your loyalty. We do hope you will be your choice on your next visit to Foothill Ranch.

Summary: I did a one night stay for a business trip and I was happy with the hotel.   The online checking was a nice feature as I knew which room I was in before I got to the hotel and also knew my room would be ready.  The room was nice and spacious, the hotel was quiet and the bed comfortable.  The morning breakfast had a lot of options and was a nice way to start the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hampton Inn Irvine East-Lake Forest for your business trip. We thrive on hearing our guests enjoy their stay, as we enjoying sharing our Hamptonality with you. We are very lucky to be located in a great area with restaurants, shopping and hiking trails nearby. We thank you again, and we look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I always feel like I'm at home when at this Hampton.  The experience starts when I first walk in and I'm welcomed back. The rooms are a bit dated but the breakfast and hospitality make that a mute point.  Barb always makes the start of my day pleasurable.  She remembers everyone!  She treats each guest the same.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, as we are very lucky to have Barbara she truly embraces Hamptonality.  We all strive for exelence and are pleased to hear when we succeed, and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: First time in this area for an overnight stay - came in town to attend a party -location was Ok and typical Hampton but just a little worn. Front desk check in staff was very helpful.  Do not use local cab service for transportation as they are not reliable.
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience with us, and appreciate your kind words regarding our staff as we strive for excellence, and love to share our Hamptonality with our guests.  We look forward to your next visit with us here in Foothill Ranch, see you soon!

Summary: I am currently on a long stint of business travel such that it is cheaper for me to stay in a hotel than rent when I am actually near my home town.  I stayed in this place using Hilton Honors points. It was welcoming and comfortable. Most of my week involved being in Irvine and Anaheim. This location was slightly further away then I would prefer. I stayed primarily due to the lower point award price.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us, we are very lucky to be located in nice area. 15 minutes away from Irvine Spectrum, 30 minutes away from Laguna Beach, we are in a central location from Disneyland and close to Anaheim Stadium.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Our first stay at Hampton Inn and we didn't get disappointed. We originally wanted to stay Hilton hotel close to Anaheim, but later decided to move to this area as it was significant cheaper using Hilton points as well as better reviews. It is a bit far from Southern California attraction, very remote  and in between cluster of toll roads, however, other than that, everything was as per my expectation. Room are simple but with  clean with comfortable bed, complementary breakfast is also very good.
Manager Response: We hope you enjoyed your visit to Foothill Ranch, we are very lucky to be located in a nice area near the hillside.  A short drive to Irvine Spectrum, Laguna Beach, San Juan Capistrano Mission, and our local shopping center.  We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Horrible customer service  uI have to check in twice second time they make me find reservation confirmation number on my email dirty hotel and staff  No one care altitude on every one,everywhere Back door broken every one can access without a key they knock my door twice 3 in the morning No security
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we apologize for having to disturb you at 3am unfortunately we received several noise complaints from your room.  We hope you will return on your next visit to Foothill Ranch.

Summary: We travel to Southern ca to visit family.  We have found that the Hampton In is an ideal place for us to stay.  It is easy access to the freeway and to shopping and to restaurants.  The breakfast is always good  so we would recommend this Hotel for anyone staying in Orange county
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn Lake Forest for your visit to Orange County.  We are very lucky to have a large shopping center within 3 mile to our property, with a CVS, Target, Movie Theater and several nice restaurants.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you,

Summary: Clean, courteous staff, good value.  Location is between my family and Disney Land.  Stayed there to be centrally located. Complementary breakfast to go was nice touch.  Contained muffin, Apple, Breakfast Bar.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we are very lucky to be located in such a great area. Just a short drive away to Disneyland, Laguna Beach, Dana Point, Irvine Spectrum and John Wayne Airport make the Hampton Inn East Irvine an ideal location for either business and or pleasure.  We thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn Irvine East - Lake Forest
Summary: Fernando Chavez and his staff were EXCELLENT, always a pleasure to see and talk with him. Fernando makes my stay for my wife and myself  special.  Highly recommended!!!!. A great location  in Lake Forest, CA and very nice free breakfast every morning.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is clean, bed was comfortable, bathroom was modern. The breakfast is a typical Hampton Inn breakfast, eggs, sausage, waffles, cereal, yogurt,coffee, and juice. Didn't make it to the pool but from the window looked very clean.  Will stay again.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us as we were glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our Hampton breakfast.  We look forward to you next visit and the opportunity to share our Hamptonality again.   Thank you,

Summary: Overall a great stay. Price was fair, front desk staff, superb... Room was comfortable, internet fast enough, we went to breakfast early,,things were great, we were checking and observed the breakfast area was overflowing,  but the staff was  busy keeping  the food stocked... A pleasant  experience! !!!
Manager Response: Welcome back to the United States and welcome to Foothill Ranch, we were glad to hear that you enjoyed your visit with us.  We thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we appreciate your loyalty to the Hilton family.  We look forward to your next visit and enjoy your travels.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights during a recent business trip to the OC. Typical no frills Hampton property in a very quiet OC suburb. Only drawback was the drive to and from Irvine which involved using the toll road (CA 241). Great value for your hotel dollar when compared to other Hilton hotels.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we are glad you enjoyed staying with stay with us.  We are near the 241 toll road, however there are many avenues to take to avoid them and are just as convenient.  On your next visit please stop by our front desk and we will be glad to map them our for you. Thank you,

Summary: High value for the quality of the room cleanliness and the complimentary breakfast. I'm a regular traveler and by far this hotel stay was one of the worst experiences I've seen. That hotel branch needs a major renovation and a better hygienic and food quality!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we were very sorry to hear that your stay was less than favorable.  As you can see below from previous guest comments this is not typical for our property. We provided the traditional Hampton breakfast daily with several options to choose from. Items included waffles, fresh sliced fruit, oatmeal, eggs, bacon, sausage, breakfast potato's, yogurts, and an assortments of pastries.  We strive for excellence and hope this isolated incident will not tarnish your future with Hilton and Hampton Inn.  We look forward to the opportunity to truly share our Hamtonality and our new Hampton on property theme.

Summary: This hotel is in a great area of Lake Forest/Irvine with many restaurants, shopping very close by.  We arrived later in the evening and had to run and get my daughter a few things for a med school interview and it was helpful to be able to run to Target.  It has a very neighborhood feel to it and I like that because it was safe.   The hotel is very clean and comfortable and the staff was very nice.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat. It is nice when hotels have ice water, fruit etc. available when you arrive at a hotel late, a nice ammenity when you want to just check in and go to bed.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we were glad to hear that your stay our Hampton Inn was a great one.  We are very lucky to be located in such a great area with many options for dining and shopping.  We look forward to your next visit to Foothill Ranch, and the opprutuinty to share more of our Hamptonality.

Summary Heading: Great location, close by restaurants of various types all moderate priced and walking distance
Summary: Great hotel for my client visit.  Was not able to stay as close as I would have liked, but this was a great location.   Plenty of moderate priced restaurants within quick walking distance.     My room was on third floor overlooking the pool.  Stay was mid-week so there was not much happening in the pool to judge noise by.  Parking was free, but I took an Uber for the trips to/from my client.  It did take a few tries for Uber on the morning run, but did find one.  Location has a well stocked snack shop, and there is a 24 hour convenience store at the Chevron just up the street just in case.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience during your business visit to Foothill Ranch. We are very lucky to be located in a in area close to several choices for dining and shopping. Irvine Spectrum, our local shopping only a few minutes away makes the Hampton Inn Foothill Ranch ideal place to stay during your visit to the area.

Summary: When we need a place to stay to visit our son in Lake Forest, CA, we always choose this Hampton Inn. It has everything we need for a long-weekend visit. The hotel is clean and the staff is friendly. We take advantage of the complimentary breakfast each morning, which has something for everyone and   offers many options.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for your continued loyalty, and truly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  We are glad that Hampton Inn - East Irvine is your home away from home, during your visit with your son.  We are very lucky to be located in such a nice area that allows our guests easy access to Irvine Spectrum, Laguna Beach and the final season to Irvine Amphitheater.  We look forward to your next visit to Foothill Ranch and hope to see you soon.   Thank you,

Summary: We are repeat customers of this Hampton Inn and planned for our four night stay.  Room was nice and clean and the hotel staff was pleasant to work with.  Brian K. at the front desk was very helpful in making our reservations and very nice to talk to.  Fernando Chavez, Hotel Manager was also very friendly and made us feel at home.  The breakfast food was prepared nicely as always.  Food area is always clean and neat.  Will stay here again on future visits to the Irvine area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to share your vacation with us and thank you for your kind words regarding our staff, we all strive for excellence and glad to hear when we succeed. We hope to see you soon on your next vacation to Foothill Ranch.

Summary: This hotel is a home run!!! The rooms,staff,breakfast etc...  Great location a lot of challenging hiking trails. The pool area is always clean and very comfortable. Lots of restaurants and retail shops in the area.  This hotel is a no brainer.
Manager Response: We appreciate the kind comments and thank you for being a loyal Hilton Honors member.  Sounds like you where able to enjoy all that Foothill Ranch has to offer, from the hiking, shopping at Irvine Spectrum, and our local eateries.  We thank you for our loyalty.

Summary: Stayed here multiple times,  the staff is always friendly and helpful. Very clean and well maintained. Complimentary breakfast has decreased in quality a little, But then again it is complimentary. Overall experience was good
Manager Response: Thank you for your continued loyalty to Hampton inn Foothill Ranch, we are very thankful for your loyalty.   We look forward to your next visit, and the next opportunity to share more of our Hamptonality.

Summary: We enjoy traveling and have found that we get the best deal from staying at a Hamptos inn in both price and that when we get up in the morning we can relax and enjoy a nice breakfast before starting on our day.
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your great experience with us, we also thank you for being loyal to Hampton Inn and the Hilton family.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us here in Foothill Ranch, we hope you were able to enjoy our local hiking trail located on our property.  This trail is a great way to enjoy the scenery after breakfast, and take in the sunsets off Saddleback mountain.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Good hotel for a Hampton Inn. Little pricey and a little out of the way but convenient for south Orange County. Rooms very plain but generally comfortable. Breakfast was at Hampton standard. Bed was comfortable but pillows were inadequate for firmness. I mainly chose the hotel for its location as it was close to a toll road and other attractions
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience with us, we appreciate your feedback.  We are very lucky to be located in a great area with a local shopping center with CVS,  Wal-Mart, Target, Movie Theater and several great local restaurants. We look forward to your next visit to Foothill Ranch.

Summary: The staff was very friendly and it was very high value. Super clean, great room, fantastic bed, and perfect for my stay locally for a wedding. Thanks for a great experience! I'll be back again if I'm in the area.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we are always striving for excellence and are excited to hear when we succeed.  We look forward to your next visit, and an opportunity to share more of our Hamptonality.

Summary Heading: Another Great Stay at Hampton Inn at Lake Forest..!!!
Summary: If your plans take you to the Lake Forest area look no further than Hampton Inn at Lake Forest. The hotel staff really take careof your every need and the complimentary breakfast cannot be beat. The location is great too.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us we strive for excellence and are excited when our Hamptonality is shared by our team.  We thank you for being a loyal guest and we appreciate your continued support and we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,

Summary: Very nice hotel, very clean, comfortable rooms, great staff, great breakfast.  Location was great as it is close to great shopping and not too far from Disney and from beaches.  Would definitely stay there again when we go back to California.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we are very lucky to be located in such a great location.  Laguna Beach, Disneyland, Irvine Spectrum and our local shopping center all within a short drive away, makes our Hampton Inn guests very happy.  We were very glad to have you stay with us and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I loved the ease of the location - handy to get everywhere I needed.  Breakfast was fab, and free - not always a combination you find.  Complimentary Internet was as fast as you needed and room was well maintained and included microwave and fridge. Staff were all friendly and efficient.  Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your experience with us, and glad your trip to Foothill Ranch was very enjoyable.  We hope you were able to visit our local shopping center home to a Wall-Mart, Target and Cinema.  We look forward to being your home away from home during your visits to Foothill Ranch. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: Nothing fancy about this hotel, but it was nice. The staff was very friendly and everything was clean. Our group had to leave very early before breakfast was served so someone from the hotel had "to go" breakfast bags for us. Very thoughtful!!!
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience during your stay in Foothill Ranch.  Glad to hear you enjoyed our "to go" breakfast, we look forward to your next visit and hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Geraldo and Barbara, you made  my stay awesome! Excellent service, clean hotel, quiet and friendly staff.
Summary: Very happy with my business trip stay at Hampton Inn.  The staff and employees of this in were over the top helpful! I also enjoyed having Hit tea or hot  chocolate at any time! Fresh fruit was also  available ... All these special features made it feel like home;) Extremely relaxing after a long day of faux painting in Dana Point.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we are very happy to hear your experience with us was a great one.  Both Barbara and Geraldo are a great examples how we all strive to share our Hamptonality with our guests.   We thank you again for choosing to stay with us for your business trip to Dana Point, and we look forward to your next visit to Foothill Ranch.

Summary: The hotel was very clean and felt very safe.  The room was lovely, including the bed and bedding.  The staff was super friendly.  The breakfast was very tasty with a nice variety.  I would definitely recommend this hotel as a really wonderful place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we are excited to hear when sharing our Hamptonality is a success. Glad you were able to enjoy our fresh waffles and fresh fruit selection. We thank you for choosing to stay with us, and hope you enjoyed your time here in Foothill Ranch.  We look forward to your next visit a hope to see you soon.  Sincerely

Summary: The AC units don't work the floor carpet smells the bathroom & shower don't flush or work properly. Complete nightmare they moved twice both rooms the AC unit didn't work. The swimming pool was green , no towels at the pool area . Breakfast was nasty.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to emphasize the issues you encountered during your stay. I am thankful that I was able to personally address your concerns while you were still in house.  Sincerely,

Summary: There needs to be a lot of updates. There is a lot of old fixtures. The bathrooms stink and need shower benches for the handicap. Cleaning people need to check under beds for trash. Make sure appliances work.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and we look forward to your next visit.  We hope to see you soon, and we appreciate you being a valued Hilton Honors guest.  Thank you,

Summary: We stay to visit Irvine area with the family. Great place, great team, perfect location.   Especially Barbara who maintained order and perfect service during breakfast was very friendly and helpful. Cleanness and maintenance was perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we are very lucky to have Barbara with us she is a great team member, and enjoys sharing Hamptonality with our guests.  We look forward to your next visit with us an hope to see you soon!  Thank you,

Summary: Great hotel with friendly staff.  Gorgeous surroundings and very safe environment.  I loved how it was close to stores/restaurants.  Nice outdoor amenities and well stocked complimentary breakfast!   Good rate for the area in CA we were in, highly recommend staying here as it is updated and clean.
Manager Response: We are very lucky to be located in a great area with a variety of restaurants, from IN & OUT Burgers, Outback, Red Robin and great shopping area with a Wall-Mart, Target & CVS.  We appreciate your kind words and look forward to your next visit to Foothill Ranch.  Thank you!

Summary: Great service! Loved the Staff. My stay was wonderful I totally felt wanted. Rooms were clean and well stocked everyday. Parking kind of far when hotel was busy and buses parked in a lot of prime parking spaces. Note, bus driver napping in bus cargo bay was not attractive.
Manager Response: We are very glad you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit to Foothill Ranch.  We appreciate your kind words and hope to see you all very soon!  Thank you!

Summary: Too much bleach used on sheets. Very strong smell. I have told front desk about this and their comment is that they will notify housekeeping. Situation has not improved in my last 3 stays. Hard to fall asleep with such strong odor
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us we are very sorry your sheets smelled like bleach, we have noted your reservations for future stays to ensure there is no a strong smell.  However we do apologize and thank you for sharing your experience and do look forward to your next visit to FootHill Ranch. Thank you,

Summary: Overall a good stay. The location is very remote, far from the hub bub of Anaheim and the resort area. Good for kids good for couples good for business.. Wifi works breakfast is free and good pool is pretty.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, as we do strive for excellence and are glad to hear when we succeed.  We are very lucky to be located in such a great area, near shopping and restaurants.  Definitely nestled away from the hustle and bustle of Anaheim and Disney.  We do look forward to your next visit to Foothill Ranch, to share more of our Hamptonality with you! Thank you,

Summary Heading: FILTHY, WORST HILTON HOTEL I HAVE EVER STAYED
Summary: The common areas are dirty. The filth on the floor is visible to my near-sighted eyes, which is terrifying as to how filthy it must be.   I would be very surprised if the elevator is in compliance. It rattles, and makes a horrible noise when in use.   My room is next to the elevator, so whenever it is in use, my room vibrates. It is so loud, it wakes me up at night.  Yesterday, I was gone from 8 am until 4.30 PM... MY ROOM WAS NOT CLEANED! Asked house keeping, they said "oh, you wanted your room serviced???"  The furniture is not at Hampton in standards, everything is old and dirty. Even the shower curtain is the cheapest, oldest curtain I have ever seen in a Hampton Inn.  I did laundry this morning. It is remarkable how dirty the laundry room is. There is trash and filth on the
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and we are very sorry to hear your experience was less than favorable.  As you can see from other reviews this is not typical of our property, and unfortunately you experience was not how we show our Hamptonality.  We do hope you continue to stay with us and all our Hilton brands.  Thank you.

Summary: Decided to go on a little staycation close to home and this hotel did not disappoint! I was able to relax by the pool, grub on free breakfast, and enjoy a clean room. Only about 10ish minutes to the spectrum and nearby restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hampton Inn Irvine East-Lake Forest for your staycation.  We thrive on hearing our guests enjoy their stay, as we enjoying sharing our Hamptonality with you.  We are very lucky to be located in a great area with restaurants, shopping and hiking trails nearby. We thank you again, and we look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: This is the second (and last) time I will stay at this property.  Both instances, the rooms were dated, the bathrooms were dirty, and the heating and AC units were pieced together very unprofessionally (there was a ineffective thermostat on the wall, which was not integrated with the HVAC-mounted thermostat.)   The TV channel offerings were also very lacking.  The TV remote was very worn, with very bad responsiveness.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us, we were sorry to hear that your stay was less than favorable. Our property was renovated March of 2015, and we are very surprised to hear about  your experience.  We do hope that you continue to stay with Hilton. We thank you.

Summary: We had the most unbelievable experience with Fernando Chavez at Hampton Inn. My grandchildren, after a long drive, were promised a swim. The hotel I booked had no pool. All the hotels in the area were booked so we were so depressed and Fernando saved the day by allowing us to swim even though we were not staying at his hotel. We will be forever grateful to Fernando for saving our vacation
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great stay for a long wedding weekend!
Summary: We stayed here on a Thursday night and a Saturday night. Great location for us, as we were close to family as well as many stores, restaurants, etc. The breakfasts selection was different on each stay! The front-desk staff was friendly and professional!
Manager Response: We were glad you enjoyed the daily selection for breakfast, and the close proximity to local restaurants.  We were happy your stay was enjoyable and we hope to see you again on your next visit to Foothill Ranch.

Summary Heading: Reasonably comfortable and clean, poor breakfast
Summary: A typical US business hotel in the mid price range.  Helpful staff and reasonably clean.  The décor is a little jaded and tired, the pool a little small but as a place to stay it is OK.   Nice touches are the images against each room to help you realise you are trying to get into someone else's room!  The breakfast is pretty basic and for evening eats there are a few places only a short walk away. Snacks and emergency provisions are available in the reception area.  Would I go back - despite my poor review this is my second visit - it's OK
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience with us we were very sorry to hear your breakfast experience was less than favorable.  We provided a breakfast with fresh fruit, waffles, assortment of pastries and warm eggs and a protein to complement any diet.  We hope this was a isolated experience, and do hope to see you in the near future. Thank you.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this location. It was convenient to shopping and restaurants. The beds were very comfy. There was a nuce selection of breakfast foods. Coffee and water were available 24hrs a day in the lobby.
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for sharing your experience with us.  We are very lucky to be located near great shopping areas, and nice restaurants.  Island Burgers, Chilies, and Red Robin are few located near us, to complete any appetite we also have a In & Out less than 3 miles away.  Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Nice, quiet hotel for the family
Summary: It's your basic family friendly hotel. Luckily, I booked my room early so I was able to choose my room away from the elevator. They have complimentary breakfast served from 6 to 10 that gets pretty busy but it's a nice spread. It's located further away from Disneyland but it's not that bad of a drive. Plus, it's better priced than staying closer to the park. :)
Manager Response: We glad you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for sharing your experience.  We also hope you had a great time at Disneyland and look forward to your next visit.  We will keep the coffee on and the Waffles warm for your next visit to Foothill Ranch. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Mission Viejo Home away from Home
Summary: Always enjoy the great Service and Amenities. The Full Service Breakfasts are always "Awesome"... This Location is totally convenient for Restaurants and any shopping you may need. Close to the Freeway system as well.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we are greatly excited to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We are very lucky to be located in such a great area.  A Movie theater, Target, CVS, Ralphs, Wal-Mart, and some very nice restaurants such as Outback, and Urban Grill to name a few.  We hope to see you soon and share our Hamptonality with you again.

Summary: Fabulous hotel!! Super friendly staff upon check-in.  The hotel manager checked us in and was very welcoming! Everything was clean. The complimentary breakfast was great!!  Everyone was really helpful with directions. :)
Manager Response: Thank for your kind words we do appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  We enjoy sharing our Hamptonality with our guests, along with the great offerings Foothill and Irvine have to offer.  The Irvine Great Park, Irvine Spectrum and the great hiking trails that Foothill Ranch offer with great views of sunsets and Saddleback Mountian.  We hope to see you soon and thank you again!

Summary: While I wasn't expecting five star accommodations this was still a disappointing experience. I arrived at 3pm which is the listed check in time and was told that they didn't have any clean rooms available. The wait time would be 30 minutes which wouldn't work for me as I had to get ready for an event I was attending that afternoon. They offered an ADA room on the first floor which I accepted. After navigating the hallway which was blocked by no less than five housekeeping carts I made it to my room. The room was far from clean as I found foreign long black hairs in the shower. YUCK! This is a huge turnoff for me as I'm pretty particular when it comes to cleanliness. Needless to say I won't be staying here again. On a positive note, the staff at the front desk were friendly.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we strive for excellence.  We apologize for any inconvenience, we do hope this isolated incident will not keep you from visiting us in the future.  We do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I stay at this location for the price and it's our company hotel. Outside of Rick, the hotel staff are horrible. Although getting better lately. Coming from Marriot I expected more based off of other people's feedback regarding Hampton Inns.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us we were very sorry that your encounters with some staff members were less than favorable.  We strive for excellence and as you can read from previous reviews this is not typical.  We hope that you will still consider us in the future.  Thank you.

Summary: Our stay at Hampton Inn,  Lake Forest, CA was very enjoyable.  It was reasonably priced and provided a hot complimentary breakfast each morning with freshly baked chocolate chip cookies and fresh fruit each night in the lobby.  The room was clean and the staff was extremely helpful.  We would recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, we were very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to share our Hamptonality with our guests and are excited to hear when we succeed.  We look forward to you your next visit to Foothill Ranch area, hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Clean but a little plain in the room
Summary: I would stay here again without hesitation.  It was centrally located for the purpose of my trip.  The food was standard Hampton Inn fare, which is to say a decent variety and all one can eat.  The staff was helpful, and the room and bathroom were very clean
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hampton Inn Foothill Ranch, we appreciate your kind words and look forward to your next visit.  Hope to see you soon on your next visit to the Foothill Ranch area.

Summary: Very nice and helpful staff, clean room and comfortable bed. The breakfast area clean and sunny and wifi worked out great. Good location with many restaurants and shops close by. Looking forward to my next visit.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your recent experience with us, we hope you enjoyed the shopping area located less than 3 miles away.  The local shopping area includes a Wal-Mart, Target, Movie Theater and several local restaurants Islands, In-Out Burgers and Outback to name a few.  We look forward to your next visit, and thank you again for choosing Hampton Inn Foothill Ranch.

Summary: Every time I come to Orange County I stay here.  I have many choices as a business traveler.  I like that when I arrive I am greeted by friendly staff as well as a cookie and flavored water.  My room is clean and the beds are comfortable.  In the morning the breakfast is good and the staff is terrific.    Overall my experiences have been positive, so I continue to come.  Thanks everyone!
Manager Response: We thank you for your continued loyalty, and appreciate the kind words.  We hope you are able to enjoy the surrounding area, including Irvine Spectrum, Laguna Beach and the beautiful sunsets off of Saddleback Mountain during your visit to Foothill Ranch.  We look forward to making your stays as pleasant in the future, we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Amazing stay for hard to please hotelier....
Summary: I have worked in hotel sales for 7 years now and this stay far exceeded my expectations! I wish I could have taken the staff with me back to Texas. Barbara in breakfast was exceptional! When she saw our shirts and asked about going to Disney, she brought us water bottles to take with us to the park. Another day she brought my 5 year old a lollipop, which made her day! Katy checked us in on 05/26 and was so helpful. She too stopped my daughter with a treat. I stayed at this location about 4 years ago before the renovation and swore I would never stay again. Since my husband is also in hotel biz (GM of a Marriott in Dallas) he suggested I give it another shot since the reno. SO glad I did! Great job to this team!
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience and your very kind words regarding both Barbara and Caiti.  We are very lucky to have both Caiti and Barbara they enjoy sharing their Hamptonality with our guests as you witness first hand.
