We were glad that you decided to return since our renovation and we look forward to your return. We thank you again for choosing Hampton Foothill Ranch.

Summary: I have written reviews about this location before because we stay there regularly. We always stay at Hampton for their quality and consistency.  I had to write this review to shine the light on a special woman named Barbara who works in the breakfast area!   My sister and I were visiting to see our mom who was at the end of her life and we spent one night. I went to the breakfast area early and knowing my sister's disabilities would prevent her from getting into those stupid remodel chairs, I wanted to find a place to sit. Barbara came up to help. She took over and not only made special accommodations for my sister, but was a caring and compassionate person! She scoped out a good table near the front and grabbed it so my sister wouldn't have to walk very far. She brought out
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we were very pleased to hear how Barbara truly impacted your stay.  We are very lucky to have Barbara on our team, and were glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to your return and we will do our best to accomidate any special needs, we sincerely thank you for your kind words and will share them with Barbara.

Summary Heading: My stay at Hampton Inn in Lake Forest
Summary: This hotel us comfortable, quiet and awesome for a single traveler.  Highly recommended. The pool was clean and really nice-the breakfast was hot,fresh and delicious.  Thank you for a peaceful stay!!  I highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, we glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate you choosing Hampton Foothill Ranch.  We look forward to making your next stay just as awesome as this one.  Hope to see you very soon!

Summary: Hotel was clean and friendly.  Staff was helpful, room was clean and comfortable, wifi worked well.  Breakfast was decent and well stocked.   Location is convenient and the area is nice.  Plenty of dining options around.  Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and we appreciate your kind words, and we look forward to you next visit.  There are several great restaurants in the immediate area, Uban Grill, Outback and for that quick bite IN-&-OUT burgers.  Hope to see you soon!

Summary: The hotel accommodation and staff are great never had a problem.  the only issue is the remodeled breakfast area.    The chairs are way to large/wide.  if you are under 6.4ft they are not conformable to sit at.    Because of the size of the chairs you cannot have more than two people to a table, when traveling with 3 or more colleagues, it makes it hard to sit together and have a relaxing conversation before the start of the day.
Manager Response: We thank you for your kind words regarding our staff as we do our best to share our Hamptonality with our guests.  We were sorry to hear that you were less than pleased with the furniture design. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you for choosing Hampton Inn Foothill Ranch.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay while visiting family.
Summary: Nice place and good location.  Modern shopping in the area and not too crowded.  Food service in the area is also very good.  Easy access to Parkways and local freeways. Service Staff was freindley and willing to answer questions.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we are very lucky to be in a nice area with views of Saddleback Mountain, and a short drive to Laguna Beach.  The Shopping area is less than 3 miles away and is home to a movie theater,  Wall-Mart, Target several chain restaurants.  We look forward to your next visit and we thank you again for choosing Hampton Inn Foothill Ranch.

Summary: My experience at the Hampton Inn Irvine East was very positive. The hotel is very clean, the staff is friendly, and it has all of the major amenities that you want in a hotel.   There's free wifi, a fitness room, outdoor pool, and free hot breakfast. The staff that I encountered takes pride in the work that they do. They also bring out hot, freshly baked cookies in the lobby around 5pm.   As a Hilton Honors member I was able to use points and cash to pay for the room (8,000 points and $40 per night). Most of the HIlton brand hotels that I was looking at in the area did not offer that.   A word of suggestion: if you're not familiar with the area, be careful about GPS directions that will take you through a toll road (which is faster). You can easily access this hotel from I-5 and
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience and thank you for being a valued Hilton Honors member.  We were very excited to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to sharing our Hamptonality with you in the future.  Thank you for sharing the tip regarding the toll road, by avoiding the toll roads you can stop by Irvine Spectrum for a quick bite to eat and do some shopping.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 weeks with my wife at the end of our road trip. The location is absolutely perfect as you are close to everyone Orange County had to offer with great access to the beaches at Laguna or Dana Point amongst others. Plenty of restaurants nearby and many many more within a short drive . The value for money that this Hilton  hotel offers is second to none and far more comfortable than some of the larger branded hotels around. You have to drive to anywhere in South California and gaz (petroleum) is relatively cheap so use this place even if you are going to Disney. It's only a 30 min drive away in a much nicer location than Anaheim. Breakfast is free and we ate here for each of our 12 days . They have cereals , oatmeal, toast , waffles and some hot food usually
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience with us during your nice long vacation, we are very lucky to be located in such a great area.  We appreciated your kind words regarding Barbara, she has a great way of sharing her Hamptonality.  Thank you again for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Once again Fernando Chavez and the staff of the Hampton Inn - Lake Forest did not disappoint. It has been 6 months since my last visit to this hotel and he remembered myself and my wife.   GREAT SERVICE!!!!!!   The location is excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recognizing Fernando and the Hampton Team. We are so happy to be your hotel of choice in Lake Forest!  We will see you soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: They won't let the thermostats be set lower than 72, but mine wasn't accurate.  I arrived late and the room was warm and took way to long to cool to a comfortable sleeping temperature. In the morning I left the room pitted out for the same reason. If you are staying more than one night, put the do not disturb sign out and leave a/c on all day if you want to sleep comfortably.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we were sorry to hear that the room didn't cool off for you.  It tends to get very warm this time of year and we do our best to keep our rooms nice and cool.  We hope that when you do return to the Foothill Ranch area you choose to stay with us.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: See Casey at the Hampton Inn
Summary: Had a very frustrating start to a night that was completely turned around by Casey at the front desk. Made the mistake of using hotwire.com to book our room which was a complete mess. Figured out that even though we were charged, the correct amount was not being extended to the hotel. At any rate hotwire was incredibly difficult and unprofessional at best. Casey went above and beyond to make us comfortable while we waited to get the mess sorted out and even spoke on our behalf to get us accommodated. He is a perfect example of making sure the customer is taken care of by all means without a doubt. I went from dealing with a company that could care less in hotwire to Casey who couldn't have cared more. He is an absolute stud in the hotel game. Casey 1, the other guy 0
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, and appreciate the kind words regarding Casey.  We strive for excellence and are delighted to hear when we succeed.  We were sorry to hear about your experience with Hotwire, however glad Casey was able to ensure your stay was handled accordingly.  We look forward to your return and thank you again.   Sincerely,   Fernando Chavez Hotel Manager

Summary Heading: Casey is the best front desk crew member
Summary: First of all, we booked our room through hot wire which was a HUGE mistake. Thankfully Casey assisted us when we checked in and took the time to fill us in on how horrible hot wire is. Apparently hot wire charges your card and then pays the hotel with another card number. Well hot wire didn't pay the hotel the correct amount so I had to sit on hold for an hour only to be hung up on by hot wire. Casey didn't have it any easier as he sat on the phone for 45 minutes trying to get us into our room. Casey was finally able to get the payment from hot wire through and we made it into our room. Casey is the nicest hotel employee I have ever come across. I will never use services such as hot wire again and highly recommend no one ever does. Book with the hotel directly, save yourself the
Manager Response: We were glad to hear that your stay with us turned out to be a nice one, we thank you for your nice comments regarding Casey.  We always do recommend to book directly with the hotel, and now with Hilton Stop clicking around campaign makes it even easier..   We thank you again and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Jus cause I needed a get away
Summary: Hotel was amazing rooms are clean staff was amazing and very accommodating pool and Jacuzzi were beautiful water was perfect. Staff was very friendly and helpful breakfast amazing couldn't ask for a better stay and great price I would do it again
Manager Response: We were glad to you hear that you enjoyed your weekend get away, the view from our heated pool and Jacuzzi are very nice around sunset it really captures the colors of California.  We hope to see you soon and glad you were able to enjoy your weekend get away.

Summary: The hotel is modern and clean. Second time visiting this hotel. The lady which arranges the breakfast each morning is so friendly and makes you feel at home. Staff at the main desk are always kind and happy to help!  Next time I'm back in Lake forest I will be staying here.
Manager Response: We were glad to hear that you will be returning to the Hampton Foothill Ranch, our team is delighted to share our Hamptonality with our guests.  We thank you for taking the time to share your experience and on your next visit please ask about our local hiking trail located in our backyard.   See you soon!

Summary Heading: Food in Bed, Objects hanging from ceiling
Summary: This location has an ongoing problem with cleanliness.  On my arrival, I turned back the covers to find food in the bed.  The sheets had obviously not been changed.  When I notified the room clerk he asked to come up to the room and confirmed that there was definitely food in the bed.  He then informed me that the same problem occurred the week prior.  I requested and was provided another room.  The next morning when sunlight made the new room more visible there was spray confetti, hanging from the ceiling.  It appears that there is a problem with the cleanliness of this establishment.. I recommend that any visitor caring for their safety avoid this establishment because of the lack of cleanliness.
Manager Response: Andrew,  Thank you for the candid review about your recent stay. I apologize.  We clearly failed to assign you the correct room and made things worse by not appropriately responding to you when you brought the matter to our attention.  Your comments are invaluable and I thank you for taking the time to provide them.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Hotel was very nice, clean and comfortable.  Staff was very friendly and accommodating.  Location was perfect for the wedding we were attending.  Breakfast was good and food staff was very nice and helpful.
Manager Response: We thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience, we hope you had a great time at the wedding.  We are lucky to be located in a nice and convenient area, less than 3 miles from a local shopping center, home to Wall-Mart, Target, Old Navy, Red Robin, and Outback.  We look forward to your next visit and we appreciated the nice comments.   Thank you!

Summary Heading: Where is the Hampton Decor That I Know and Love?
Summary: I was expecting to find the beauty and elegance of a typical Hampton Inn when reserving a room at this hotel. Instead I was shocked to find a new motif that is straight out of the Ikea catalogue. It looks awful! The walls are white and bare. The furniture is truly ugly. This is just a glorified version of a Motel 6 room. On the brighter side, the service was excellent. However, if this new décor is the future of Hampton Inns, then I’m staying away from this chain for good.
Manager Response: We do appreciate you sharing your comments regarding our Staff Service, as we do strive for excellence and are glad to hear when we make an impact.  We were sorry to hear that the recently renovated décor was not to your liking and do appreciate all feedback.  We still hope to be your choice when visiting the Foothill Ranch area, and look forward to sharing our Hamptonality!

Summary: I was very impressed by both the appearance of the hotel and the professionality of the hotel staff. All aspects, from the front desk personnel to housekeeping to the breakfast attendant. They all were more than willing to help and make sure that my stay was relaxing and enjoyable. I definitely recommend this hotel for any travelers wanting someplace nice, without having to pay an arm and a leg for a room.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, as we strive for excellence.  We hope you were able to explore the surrounding area during your visit to the Foothill Ranch area.  The Irvine Spectrum is a great shopping area home to an Apple store, Dave & Busters and Macys, located only 15 minutes away.  We look forward to you next visit to share our Hamptonality once again.

Summary: I was having my house fumigated one weekend, and this place came highly recommended. The hotel is newly renovated, free cookies everyday, and close to a lot of restaurants. Caitlyn at the front desk was very professional and down-to-earth. Didn't feel like just a number upon check-in. The breakfast girl Faye was also awesome! I'm amazed she still keeps a smile on her face given how busy it gets, and especially when some of the other demanding guest act other than human. Will be back again!
Manager Response: We thank you for your kind words regarding both Caitlyn and Faye, we strive for excellence and we are glad to hear when we succeed.  We hope you enjoyed your stay with us, and being your home away from home. Glad to hear that you were able to visit the local shopping center, home to a Wall-Mart, Target, and movie theater. The Urban Grill is a local favorite home to a fresh local menu too.  We hope to see you soon and to continue to share our Hamptonality with you again.

Summary Heading: Use to be a great hotel
Summary: Very disappointed with this stay. Use to love this hotel but they remodeled the rooms and the rooms look good but are not functional. The microwave is on a shelf that is less then a foot off the floor. You have to get down on your hands and knees to use it. What were they thinking. And there is no towel racks in the bathroom. And to add insult to injury, they raised their prices.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we were sorry to hear that you were less than pleased with our remodeled rooms.  We hope you were still able to enjoy your stay with us, and do hope you return.  We thank you for staying with us!

Summary: People usually wouldn't call having to go to a funeral an amazing trip, let alone call a single mom in a wheelchair traveling with a 1.5 year old girl and 7 year old boy an easy trip...but The Hampton Inn Irvine East made both true. From the moment my kids and I arrived the staff at this hotel made this hard trip so easy with their kindness, helpfulness, and friendliness to my kids. Barbara is the amazing woman who works diligently making a great array of breakfast foods, everything from waffles to oatmeal yogurt and cereal even a juice bar. My kids are messy and rambunctious to say the least, and when they rolled in with me 10 minutes before breakfast ended at 10 I am sure her heart sank knowing the disaster she would have to clean up. She smiled and even said she would clean
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your story with us, we were very glad to hear we were able to make your hard trip to California a memorable one.  We strive for excellence and are delighted to hear when we exceed expectations.   We thank you for all your kind words and we thank you! Hamptonality starts with us!

Summary Heading: Extremely accommodating! Clean, very friendly, great breakfast
Summary: We had a very last minute check in that wasn't planned,  the staff and manager were very flexible, very kind, and went over and beyond to serve us and make our stay a wonderful one. We enioyed the pool, spa,  breakfast, all day coffee and tea, fresh baked cookies!  Very clean, our family will stay here again upon our return! Thank you staff!!
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, it was a pleasure to meet you and your family.  We hope you were able to make it to Griffith Park Observatory, and Hollywood & Highland while you were visiting the Foothill Ranch area.  We were glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay along with our Hamptonality we look forward to seeing you all very soon.

Summary: Previously submitted - Hampton Inn Irvine East - Lake Forest, CA;  Also see above ID.             ====An Interesting Stay====  Thanks to our daughter who made our reservations so we could attend our grandson's birthday party, my wife and I arrived at the Hampton Inn by Hilton at Foothill Ranch in Irving/East Lake Forest, CA about 7pm on Feb 24, Wed, for a stay of several days.  • Being an authentic traveling guest, the following review and comments stem from my experiences as a government inspector and investigator, familiar with documenting first-hand observations acceptable to courts as factual accounts. •  My wife and I noticed as we drove up to the "Hampton Inn by Hilton" that it was located next door to another "Hilton" hotel known as the "Garden Inn"... more about that
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide such a conscientious review of our hotel. It’s very helpful to see a detailed report from a guest perspective. We will review each area in detail and share with our teams.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback and for choosing our hotel.  If your travels bring you to the area again, we hope you’ll choose to stay with us.

Summary: Nice Location but room layout was not convenient. Doors for both bathroom and closet swing against you in a narrow walk way as you come from the bed area. Breakfast area very small. We had trouble putting together a place for our business team to have breakfast together. Desk clerks were very friendly and very accommodating.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we were very sorry to hear that the hotel layout was inconvenient.  We do strive for excellence and do hope that you were still able to enjoy your stay with us.  We thank you for the positive feedback with our desk team, and look forward to your next visit.  See you soon!

Summary: The front desk makes all the difference.  Solid hotel, clean and comfortable.  BUT if you need anything just ask, the front desk staff may be the best ever.  i have stayed there often when traveling to the OC and am always disappointed when they are booked up.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we strive to make it right.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, and look forward to your return. On your next visit we can share some cool local attractions Foothill Ranch and surrounding areas have to offer.  The Irvine Great Park and Laguna Beach are not to far from us, along with the Mission Viejo Lake.  We look forward to seeing you and sharing our Hamptonality with you soon.  :)

Summary: Great Hotel, staff are all 10's. The manager Of the breakfast area truly understands a Great Customer Service and hard work. Our Trip was a huge success as we attended both Grand children's Birthday and celebrated Easter with our entire family. This Hotel had great access to everything in South Orange County. I would recommend this to all.
Manager Response: We thank you for your kind words, as we all strive to embrace Hamptonality with all our guests!  Barbara is a true asset and we are very lucky to have her on team Hampton Foothill Ranch.   We look forward to your next visit, and we truly glad you enjoyed the Easter holiday along with your grandchildren's birthdays.  See you soon! Thank you!

Summary: This hotel was very clean, had firm and comfortable beds,  and had no strong odors from cleaners like many hotels do. The breakfast had so much variety. It is absolutely the nicest Hampton I have been to.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the terrific review!  We are so happy that you enjoyed every aspect of your stay with us at the  Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  We are a great spot whether you are traveling for business or pleasure.  We are fortunate to be located in the heart of Foothill Ranch and have several restaurants and shops right in our backyard.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Had a small problem during check in but the staff handled it quickly and very professionally.  The hotels in this area are expensive but for the price, you can't beat this hotel.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we appreciated you allowing us the opportunity to resolve any issues you experienced.  We look forward to your next visit to Foothill Ranch area and hope to continue to be your Hampton of choice. See you soon!

Summary: Manager Fernando greeted us very openly.  Barbara the person handling the Breakfast was fantastic and very cordial and helpful.  The weekend Breakfast person needs some of Barbara's personality.  The weekend Housekeeping people also need some training in being more friendly. The front desk people were all very friendly. The Lake Forest area is a high end community with a shopping center and restaurants right down the street.  We will be Back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words us we enjoy welcoming everyone with open arms, and sharing our Hamptonality with our guests.  We are very lucky to be located in such a nice area with shopping centers and only a few miles away from Irvine Spectrum and the Verizon Amphitheater.  We hope to see you again soon, and thank you again for your sharing your experience with us.

Summary: Spoke with hotel 2 days prior informing of dangerous allergy problems.  Cannot have any feather pillows or comforters or I would end in hospital.  Was informed that was no problem.  When got into our room all pillows were feather and had to place in hall.  Called for foam pillows.  Front desk clerk said all pillows were gone and he would give us blankets to lay our heads but we would have to come and get them ourselves.  We ended up at 10:00 p.m. going out and BUYING our own pillows.  We were comp for the night by manager.  Plus the food was also terrible. Will never say here again.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience, as we do strive for excellence we failed in your case, we do hope you would allow us another opportunity in the future.  I personally would handle your reservation should you decide to stay with us on your next visit to the Foothill Ranch area.  Thank you.

Summary: The hotel is an easy drive to a lot of the city of Mission Viejo, and very close to a mall with multiple restaurants selling a variety of cuisine.  There's even a movie theater.  The hotel itself is very nice, has a good breakfast, and is staffed by very polite people.  I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we are very fortunate to be located in a great area with In&Out burgers, Outback Steakhouse, Walmart and the trendy Urban Grill for those foodies.  We look forward to your next visit, and hope to see you soon.

Summary: We came with our basketball team and families for a tournament nearby.  The staff was extremely friendly and pleasant, the complimentary breakfast was great and rooms were very nice.  Location is very nice.
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience with us, we are very lucky to be close Lake Forest Sports Park & Recreation Center, as well as a local shopping center that includes a Wal-mart, Target and In-Out Burgers.  We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: Our stay here was very rewarding the staff we arrived before the three oclock time so the staff was helpful in getting us into our room early and then they gave us needed help in getting  directions.  THe breakfast the next moring was great
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we were delighted to hear that your stay was great.  We look forward to seeing you soon on you next visit to the Foothill Ranch area.  Thank you!

Summary: I sent a week at this hotel and was very satisfied with the cleanliness of the room and friendliness of the staff.  Nice breakfast every day and not a big crowd to deal with.  Makes for a relaxing start.
Manager Response: We thank you for making our Hampton Hotel your home away from home, we were glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope you were able to take advantage of our great location, and able to explore our Hiking trail in our own backyard.  The local shopping area that includes Wal-Mart, Target, and several local restaurants make it very convenient during your week with us.  We look forward to you visiting us soon. Thank you!

Summary Heading: First Time Stay - Worth the travel time to Disneyland
Summary: Disneyland trip weekend.  Could not get a decent rate for all 3 nights in a Hilton-branded hotel anywhere in  Anaheim or SNA. Booked 2 nights in a Doubletree we frequent in SNA.  Chose Hampton Lake Forest for our first night because rate was only $40 + points and reviews were good.  Distance from DL didn't matter since all we wanted was a place to crash for the night (we knew we would not check in until 11pm-ish) and we weren't doing DL until the next day.  Have to say that the hotel is so nice we may just elect to do the driving back and forth to DL every day and stay here next time.  Beds and linens and pillows to die for.  Nice size bathroom with lots of counter space that allowed two women to get ready at the same time LOL.   Smaller room when compared to other Hamptons
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we strive for excellence and are very happy to hear when our valued guests enjoy their stay!  We are located not too far from Disneyland, and less than 30 minutes away from Laguna Beach too.   We look forward to you visiting us in the future, and thank you again for choosing Hilton Hotels and being a Hilton Honors Member.

Summary: Our room was clean and comfortable.  The staff was friendly and the complimentary breakfast and hot coffee was good.  Front desk associate that helped me at check-in was great.  We will stay again when in the area.
Manager Response: We were glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, and appreciate the recondition of the Hampton team!  We hope on your next visit we can share some local attractions in the area, including The Irvine Spectrum and the nice scenic drive down to Laguna Beach.   We Hope to see you soon!

Summary: overall great stay!! kind and helpful associates. I can't remember the lady's name who provided breakfast during the week. . but she was great!! truly exemplifies wonderful customer service and the way it should be!!  the room was perfect for the three of us the kids enjoyed the pool and plenty of access to stores around including WalMart!! if your looking to stay here to get to Disneyland I'd say it is about 25 minute drive and you will have toll fee.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments! We are glad that your family enjoyed your stay with us. We are very fortunate to have Barbara serving our guests for breakfast. Thanks for taking the time to mention her. We look forward to having you visit us again soon.  :)

Summary: The location is right off the freeway, it's always clean, and the staff are more than accommodating.  I usually arrive a little earlier than the posted check in time, but they always manage to find me a room.  The staff are very kind and concerned about the quality of my stay.  Home away from home!
Manager Response: We are glad to have you back!  Thanks for continuing to make us your hotel of choice when in the Foothill Ranch area.  We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: If you are going to be anywhere near the 241 corridor, this is a great place to stay.  Free parking, free breakfast, spacious room with mini fridge and microwave, plus it's very clean and well maintained.  I wish I had more occasion to stay here, but generally it's a bit far from my business meetings (occasionally it works out though).
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoy your time here, and our amenities. Along with everything we have here we are less than a mile away from great shopping and restaurants and even a local nature trail that can take your mind off a busy work day.  We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: I stayed there for 5 nights on a business trip in the area and this hotel exceeded my expectations.  The rooms are very spacious but feel a bit clinical.  On the other hand the staff friendliness and helpfulness made up for that.  The hotel offers a breakfast inclusive of room rate which caters for most tastes. You can get free coffee or tea at any time of the day from the lobby.  The breakfast area next to the lobby is comfortable with the TV on to catch up is the the news. The lady in charge of breakfast (Barbara) is extremely welcoming and helpful: she bought almond milk just for me as I cannot have dairy products. The location of the hotel is convenient as close to a shopping areas and restaurants. The gym is very small but has two treadmills so is useable. I would
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments! We are glad to be your home away from home while on business.  We are very fortunate to have Barbara. Thanks for taking the time to mention her.  It really made her day.  Hamptonality starts with US!

Summary: Stay here.  It is simple to check in, check out, get to all parts of SoCal.  The staff is professional, kind, but not overbearing.  Clean rooms, simple, not over the top, but not cheap looking either.  Good location, facility, and people.  What more would you really need?
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback!  We hope that you were able to explore the Foothill Ranch area while you were here.  Irvine Spectrum is another great spot and only a little over six miles away.  It has great shopping and restaurants, too.

Summary: Hotel is clean and staff is friendly. There is a very nice nature trail within walking distance of the hotel. Other than that, there isn't much around the area.   One warning though, I stayed in room 319, which is a slightly larger room due to the elevator shaft. And you can hear the elevator VERY clearly in the room. It's not super loud but it is a nuisance. I can imagine room 219 and 119 is the same, and same on the other side of the elevator. Just be aware.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the nature trail located adjacent to us.  There are many local trails in the Foothill Ranch area that we can share with you on your next visit, in addition to many fun, local restaurants like the Urban Grill.  We apologize for the elevator noise, but do hope you enjoyed the larger room and we look forward to your return.

Summary: I travel a lot and this hotel just basely met my standards.  I asked questions of the front desk and they never got back to me.  The housekeeping was late afternoon and we had to remind them to service the room.  The rates went up after the first night and I didn't know it until I got the invoice.
Manager Response: We are sorry we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. This is not typical of our usual Hamptonality and welcoming staff, and we are always looking for ways to improve our customer experience. We try hard to make sure all of our guests have a great stay as we are all about Satisfaction Guaranteed. Thank you for your feedback and we hope you will come back and stay with us again.

Summary: This was an excellent and clean hotel. The staff were friendly and helpful. I would highly recommend it to anyone who wants a wonderful, inexpensive place to stay. The hotel seemed pretty full, but I heard no noise during the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay.  I am delighted that you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area again soon.

Summary: I stay here 1x or more per month. Staff is always friendly always a smooth and quick check in. Good clean room in a location very close to many types of restaurants. Excellent for business travelers. The lady that takes care of the breakfast takes great pride in it and makes sure that you have what you need. It's typical Hampton breakfast fare, if you are wanting more then go to a better restaurant.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone considering it's competitive cost in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business and the terrific review.   Thank you for recognizing Barbara, our Breakfast Hostess.  She does an outstanding job for us and I am so happy you have had the chance to get to know her.   We feel that we are a great value in a great location and are so happy that you feel the same.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: If you don't have to go there, you would be better off going somewhere else
Summary: I arrived 12/24/2015 late night. Before getting there I tried to contact the hotel main number that was listed everywhere on the internet. Believe it or not, to my disbelieve, the it was giving an announcement that the # is no longer in service!! When I arrived late that night and dialed the # in front of the front desk, the guy was very passive and said, really? Sorry about that. Very unusual reaction for such an important issue.  The  the next day when we've got to the room, Nobody came in to clean the room and put a shampoo replacement. When I asked, they said "Sorry we are understaffed"!!  Then the next day again I had to call for Shampoo! The next late night when I came to the hotel, the key was not working!! At 1:00 am I came down to reprogram the key. 2:30 am my son
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide such a candid review of your recent stay with us.   I am terribly sorry that we failed to meet your expectations which are clearly in line with the level of service and type of experience we typically provide.   I have reviewed your comments with our team members in order to ensure that such issues are not repeated.

Summary: We have many options in the Lake Forest area for good hotels, but after a wonderful stay in July, we opted to return to the Hampton Inn - Foothill Ranch for a few days at Christmastime. We were again NOT disappointed.  The room was comfortable, well-appointed and met our needs. The staff was welcoming, the complimentary internet worked to perfection and the breakfast way above "ordinary".  It's ease of access (parking, location) and smaller size made it just the right fit for us.  We are heading back in June 2016 and no question what will be our first choice of hotels for the upcoming visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back to Foothill Ranch in 2016.  We are very fortunate to be able to offer our guests complimentary breakfast, parking and high speed internet access.   We think we are a terrific value and option for those visiting this area of Orange County.  Thank you for your continued business and we will see you soon.

Summary: Great no-frills, affordable hotel with great accommodations and friendly staff.  Stayed here on business and it was perfect for my needs - quiet, convenient location, and clean.  Plus the waffle makers are always great!
Manager Response: The waffles are always a hit, nothing better than starting your day off with a nice warm waffle and a cup of coffee.  Thank you for the review and we look forward to welcoming you back to Foothill Ranch in the future.

Summary: Good location, nice service, not luxury hotel but it has what you need for business.  Nearby shops & restaurants are a plus to this location. last stay the rates were too high but its a trend for the hotels around this area. book ahead of time.   they definitely need to work on the elevator, it takes forever, and if you are at the 3rd floor, good luck!   breakfast needs improvement too...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent visit.  I appreciate your candid feedback regarding the elevator.  We have reviewed this comment with our team members to ensure we are staying off the elevator during peak times.   I am sorry that our breakfast service did not meet your expectations.   We know you have a choice when you travel and hope that should you return to the Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area again, you will allow us another opportunity to be of service to you.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times and always have a great stay.  Rooms are clean, quiet, comfortable.  Plenty of free parking.  Free Internet works great.  Free Breakfast.  24-hour coffee complimentary.  Free computer and printer available for use.  Free cookies in the evening.  Great shower in large bathroom.  All rooms have a fridge and microwave which saves you money on restaurants.  Staff very nice and helpful.  This hotel is a great value for your money.
Manager Response: Thank you for the terrific review.  We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit with us once again.  Our team was delighted to read your comments.   We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: close to quite a few places to eat, easy to get to, friendly staff.  I'd stay here again.  straight shot to get where we needed to go as well and not too far from the airport.  fitness room could use real towels vs the paper towels in there, but that's a small thing.  fridge wasn't plugged in (probably had never been used) but also a small thing.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us.   We are so fortunate to be centrally located in the Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area of Orange County.  The John Wayne Airport in Santa Ana is the closest airport.  In addition to John Wayne, we have many guests who utilize the Long Beach Airport as well.   We have a number of restaurants in the area and aren’t too far from Laguna Beach, Newport Beach and Costa Mesa.   Thank you for the feedback on the guest room and fitness center items.  We appreciate your comments and look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: This is a very nice Hampton and a good choice in the area.
Summary: This is a pretty standard Hampton Inn in many respects, so if you have stayed at a few Hampton''s then you know what you are getting here.    Standard free breakfast, but the breakfast area is a little small for a hotel of this size.  Its not a big deal on most days, but it could be if many people stayed here all at once.  I could imagine that many people stay here, because of the many businesses that have offices in the area.      The rooms are nice, and I don't have any complaints about the room.  The internet in the room seemed to work well, but I didn't use it enough to give it a definitive thumbs up.    The business center is in the main lobby, so a little substandard.  They only have one computer, as well.   Overall, this is a nice place to stay, and if I was in the area
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us.  Many of our guests choose to stay with us do to our central location in the Foothill Ranch area.  We also have many guests who choose to stay with us as we are close to several sports parks that play host to tournaments throughout the year.    I am happy that you had an opportunity to enjoy our complimentary breakfast and internet. We know you have a choice when you travel and look forward to being your hotel of choice again in the future.

Summary: Very comfortable hotel for a great value. Excellent breakfast with bacon and eggs too. Remember to look for additional seating in a separate room. I would recommend this hotel for anyone staying in the Lake Forest area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the taking the time to write a review about your stay.  We get a number of positive comments about our complimentary breakfast and our terrific breakfast.  I am happy you had the opportunity enjoy it.  I’m so glad that our location in the Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area makes us your hotel of choice.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and thank you for your business.

Summary: I've stayed at this property over the years since it is close to out-of-town family. It has been a couple years since my last visit and I was pleased to see that the property has been renovated.  The guest rooms including the bathrooms are improved and updated. As always at Hamptons, you can expect a comfortable bed. We were on the third floor and our room was quiet. The breakfast room is small but they open up an adjacent conference rooms on busy mornings. The furniture that was selected for the breakfast room is really impractical- with huge, uncomfortable chairs that won't fit under the table. Really out-of-scale for such a small space. There are two WiFi connections - choose the AT&T complimentary-we were told it is faster than the HHonors connection.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us again.  We are so happy to be your hotel of choice when visiting the Foothill Ranch area of Orange County.  Thank you for the feedback on the renovation.  Thank you for the comments on the WiFi.  I will ensure that the AT&T connection and the HHonors connection are running as designed.    Again – thank you and we look forward to being of service to you in the future.

Summary: We tried to check in on-line using the hotel's new automated system. It still needs a lot of work, but the hotel is very good, very clean, and attractive. The rooms are ample in size with plenty of outlets so you won't be hunting behind head boards to plug in your gear. The furnishings are on the "inexpensive" side and we cannot imagine the lamps will last very long, but the bedding was firm and the pillows comfortable. The typical continental breakfast was excellent but more seating is definitely needed. The pool out back was packed and looked inviting. The location is not particularly close to the restaurant areas, so a car will be handy. There are several restaurants about a mile away.  This place happened to meet our needs for a family get together, and we will use it again
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  While the property went through a complete renovation in the spring of 2015, we are still fine tuning some items and appreciate your feedback.   Many of our guests choose to stay with us because of our location in the Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area.  Within just a couple miles are some well known restaurants such as Outback, Red Robin, Islands, In-N-Out, Rudy’s Pub & Grill and a couple local favorites as well including the Urban Grill and Wine Bar.   We look forward to continuing to be your hotel of choice when you are in the area.

Summary: Everything went well with this stay, staff was helpful.  Room was clean.  There was plenty of coffee cups but no water cups in bathroom.   Bed and pillows were good.  Experienced a little slowness on Internet.
Manager Response: We thank you for staying with us we appreciate the feedback and we look forward to your return, hopefully you were able to take in the beautiful sunsets while you were here. Hope to see you soon!  Thank you Hotel Manager

Summary: I have been a Marriott Rewards member for over 15 years, but due to Fernando Chavez and his staff I have joined HHonors. The service that I received was beyond compare. Because of the service I received I will use Hilton as my first choice when out of town.
Manager Response: Thank you Richard D for an amazing review of our hotel. We love reading these types of comments. I have to agree the team here is amazing, but more importantly truly genuine.  Thank you again and we can't wait to have you visit us again in the near future!  Kenneth A Hampton Inn Foothill Ranch / Lake Forest

Summary: Except for a couple of very noisy neighbors, the room and hotel in general was very clean and fresh.  Employees were extremely friendly and accommodating.  Location to shopping, restaurants was great.  It was refreshing to wake up in the morning to the foothills and warm air.
Manager Response: Thank you johncM654VI for taking the time to review the hotel. I sincerely apologize about the noise from the neighbors. I am however happy to hear that the rest of your stay went well. I have to agree the Hampton Inn of Foothill Ranch is clean and fresh in addition having a great team to be at your service. We do hope you'll come back and visit us again soon!  Kenneth A Hampton Inn Foothill Ranch / Lake Forest

Summary: They'll make it RIGHT! As I was attending a church conference at the Saddleback Church (only 3 minutes away), I selected this Hilton Property due it's proximity to the church's and since I'm a Diamond Member of the Hilton Honors program. After the first night I questioned my judgment due to various problems I had encountered with the hotel and my room in particular (sloppy housekeeping, poor maintenance, filthy grounds keeping and unhelpful staff to address my concerns). But (after speaking with the new Property Manager) and getting some positive improvements, I must say this property is definitely heading in the right direction.  Apparently, I arrived as the new manager had just arrived. He was assessing the situation and welcomed and fully addressed my input.  By the time I
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was surprised to have enjoyed my stay at the Hampton Inn.  Upon my arrival it was surprised at the cleanliness of the lobby and room.  It looked and smelled very clean and well kept.  Breakfast options were great and kept fresh along with friendly staff members.
Manager Response: Thank you John S for a wonderful review. I do have to agree our hotel is quite clean with a great selection for our morning complimentary Breakfast. However nothing makes a stay even better than to have a friendly team that is more than willing to ensure a flawless stay. We do hope you'll come back and visit us again soon!  Kenneth A Hampton Inn Lake Forest / Foothill Ranch

Summary: Chose this hotel for a two night business trip. Upon arrival, my reservation was not showing as paid for and I was forced to contact my company travel team at almost midnight to get the room paid for. After that was resolved, the clerk was apologetic and gave us water without charging us for it. The room was nice and clean. The bed was a painful disappointment. It dipped in the middle, causing my husband and I to constantly roll into the middle and hurt our backs both nights. It hurt so badly, I almost cried in the morning trying to get out of bed.  When we checked out, the day clerk was very apologetic and refunded one night back because of the bed. It was very nice of him.
Manager Response: Thank you Amber L for taking the time to review our hotel. I can't apologize enough for the level of comfort with the mattress had during your stay. Rest assure, upon your check out we've had the chance to review the specific bed and have made remedies to ensure that others won't experience the same. We are however happy to hear that the rest of your stay went well. We do hope you'll give us a second opportunity in the near future.  Kenneth A.

Summary: good overnight stay.... hotel is semi renovated beds are comfortable room was clean some updates are noticeable in the room the hallways do smell a little musty due to the old carpet but rooms are decent.Breakfast was ok waffles were the best not good for a vacation but good for a quickstay location is also in a quiet area i would return if needed again..
Manager Response: Greetings Lily Z,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I do have to agree the beds are comfy and the waffles are the best. That's the one difficult part of being in the lobby early in the morning is trying to resist the delicious waffles. Looking forward to your next visit.  Kenneth A.

Summary: Spent the last 2 nights there as my house was being worked on so I know the area well. Typical Hampton, clean convenient and friendly staff. Average breakfast, lots of cable channels and close to business, retail and dining
Manager Response: Thank you so much for a positive review. I do hope you were able to make this past stay a stay-cation. I do have to agree we do have a variety of channels to select from in addition to great and friendly staff. We do hope you'll come back and stay with us again soon.  Kenneth A

Summary: An excellent place to stay in Ca We found the food excellent and the room comfortable and the staff very helpful when we had questions    The hotel was close to areas that we wanted to see and their is a lot to see in South Orange county
Manager Response: Greetings John S,  Thank you so much for your great comments about the Hampton Inn Lake forest / Foothill Ranch. I do have to agree our fellow team members are more than helpful and rooms are comfortable.   Our location is quite a unique one with a plethora of restaurants, shopping, and other fun attractions in the OC area. Definitely another great reason to come back and see us again soon!  Thank you again, Kenneth A Hampton Inn Lake Forest / Foothill Ranch

Summary: This hotel is very quiet and is close to restaurants and some shopping.  Staff is very friendly.  Room was clean and I loved the chaise for lounging.  Although I didn't have the breakfast, my husband did and he found it satisfactory especially since you didn't have to leave the hotel to eat something.  Close to 241 freeway so not a lot of travel time to get and off the freeway.
Manager Response: Greetings Margaret W,   Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I have to agree our hotel is well situated in an area that's near a plethora of restaurant options, entertainment, and shopping. I'm sad to hear you didn't get the chance to try out our fantastic breakfast. We do hope you'll come back again soon to try it out.  Thank you again, Kenneth A Hampton Inn Lake Forest / Foothill Ranch

Summary Heading: A good sleep in a standard setting at a great value.
Summary: We stayed there for a few days during renovations on our home.  Sleep was excellent and things were in working order.  A/C was not too noisy so we were able to sleep.  HOORAY!  That's mostly what matters.  Breakfast setup was well stocked.  Attracts a pleasant and eclectic (but not weird) crowd, mostly business people working in the area, including folks visiting from overseas.  This is not in Irvine but it is close...it's in the Foothill Ranch section of the City of Lake Forest.  Closer to Mission Viejo actually.  It's a Hampton Inn so we weren't focused on snazzy amenities, just a great sleep at a great value and it delivered.
Manager Response: Greetings Chuck404,   Thank you so much for the positive review. We're glad your choose Hampton Inn Lake Forest / Foothill Ranch as your choice of stay during your home renovations. I have to agree our breakfast is definitely well laid out with a variety the redefines your basic idea of  complimentary breakfast. And I'm not sure if you had the chance to try it out but our "Make your Own Waffle Station" is addicting without a doubt. But nothing makes breakfast even better like a great night sleep. Thank you again we do hope you'll visit us again soon, if not for a renovation cause, perhaps a short Staycation.  Kenneth A Hampton Inn Lake Forest / Foothill Ranch

Summary: This Hampton Inn is in a great location. There are plenty of places  to eat and shopping close by. It's away from the hustle and bustle of the LA traffic yet only about 30 minutes to Disneyland.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Greetings Daven2323, thank you so much for the great positive review. I have to agree we are in a unique location that offers a variety of shops and restaurants in addition to being away from all of the LA Traffic while still being centrally located near all of the great Orange County Attractions. We do hope you'll come back and visit us again soon!  Kenneth A. Hampton Inn Lake Forest / Foothill Ranch

Summary: It was the cheapest hotel in the area! Beds were very soft and cheap. Sheets were very flimsy. Rooms were very old and not updated at all. Bathroom tubs were from the mid 80s...this hotel needs to remodel their guest rooms with new furniture and bathrooms!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. I want to assure you that we are very proud of our level of service, Cleanliness and quality of our hotel. I am sorry to hear we fell below your expectations when you stayed. I do hope you give us another chance for a future stay to show you how great we really are.  Thank you again.

Summary: Everything was great.  The room was clean and quiet and the location was close to our visiting area.  The breakfast was a bit of a letdown because they did not offer the very good ham and cheese omelets; otherwise no complaints.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. And Yes I have to agree with you our hotel facilities are clean and quite. I apologize about the breakfast not having your omelette, we actually serve these options to provide a variety every so often. Rest assure this program will continue. We do hope that you'll come back and visit us again soon!  Kenneth A

Summary: Great hotel while visiting a friend in area. Not much around it but quick drive to Laguna Beach and other orange county locations. Very good breakfasts. Clean and comfortable - up to Hampton standards
Manager Response: Dear 205greggl,   Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. It's always great to read comments especially about our hotel being clean and comfortable. I have to agree we do have a great breakfast selection in our newly renovated Dining area. We do hope you'll come back and visit us again soon!  Kenneth A. Hampton Inn Lake Forest / Foothill Ranch

Summary Heading: A great stay at a very nice hotel.
Summary: Staff was super friendly and hotel was spotless.  Loved the fact that coffee was available all day. We are allowed to check it early which was deeply appreciated. Breakfast was good.  This hotel exceeded my expectations and I would strongly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much Brian N.  for a great review. We truly value all of our guests reviews and want thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn of Lake Forest. It was a pleasure having you stay with us and it brings us great joy to hear a positive review especially about our fellow team members. I will be sure to share your comments to the rest of the team. Please do come back and visit us again soon!  Kenneth A Hampton Inn Lake Forest / Foothill Ranch

Summary: This is an excellent new hotel in a great neighborhood. People are friendly and our whole experience was great! My young boys liked the open pool and the breakfast in the corner of the new hotel lobby.
Manager Response: Thank you Saif I for taking the time to review our hotel. I have to agree we are in great neighborhood especially when we're near a lot of local restaurants and shops. We're extremely happy to hear that your family had a great time here and we do hope that we'll be your next choice again when you return.   Thank you again,  Kenneth A Hampton Inn Lake Forest / Foothill Ranch

Summary: The hotel was clean, quiet and the staff was very friendly, taking the time to joke and ask about our trip. The breakfast buffet was the standard Hampton fare, but the area was clean and the staff kept it stocked
Manager Response: Thank you SonyaK21 for a lovely review of our hotel. We love reading such positive reviews especially when it's about our amazing team. We take pride in ensuring our team members can be themselves and in turn be truly genuine to all of our guests.   Thank you again and we do hope you'll come back and visit us again in the near future!  Kenneth A Hampton Inn Lake Forest / Foothill Ranch

Summary: Hotel is very comfortable, quiet and clean. My wife and I Arrived late but they still had our reserved room waiting for us. Breakfast was more than we expected. Great selection. We will stay at a Hampton Inns again.
Manager Response: Thank you Luis H S for such a great review. I have to agree, here at Hampton Inn of Lake Forest/Foothill Ranch, we do have a great selection for our complimentary breakfast.   What can I say, a clean hotel and clean rooms is must here which is why we strive to ensure sheer perfection. Thank you again and please do come back and visit us again soon!  Kenneth A Hampton Inn Lake Forest / Foothill Ranch

Summary: very nice place a little noisey but workable, was only here one night for the company i work for willl stay again if i need to. do not use any thing there and only helped myself to some juice because i was going to a moning meeting with breakfast
Manager Response: Greetings David S,   Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I want to sincerely apologize for the level of noise you may have experience. I can assure you that our hotel is relatively quiet and the noise you experience is not of the norm. In addition I do hope upon your next visit, should you be short on time to enjoy our complimentary breakfast, that you stop by the the front desk as we do provide complimentary to-go Breakfast bag filled with treats and a beverage.  Thank you again and we do hope you'll come back and visit us again soon! Kenneth A

Summary: This was the best stay at any hotel I've ever been at. The staff was incredible and took exceptional care of us. The hotel was clean and had additional room darkening shades. The bathrooms were updated with extra counter space. But mostly, the staff was the greatest! Didn't want to go home they took such good care of us.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property the Hampton Inn of Foothill Ranch. We love reading such great reviews especially about our employees. I do hope you'll come back and visit us again soon!  Kenneth A. Hampton Inn Foothill Ranch

Summary Heading: One of the nicest Hamptons I've stayed in.
Summary: One of the best Hampton Inn I have stayed in. Nice quiet area, backs up to the Hilton Garden inn and a small freeway, but very little noise.   Friendly, "what can we do for you service". New clean, updated rooms. Watch the low flush water toilets, as they can be tricky, but when we had an issue, they sent someone up quickly.   Great breakfast, hot make your own waffles, hot oatmeal, hot eggs and protein (bacon one day, sausage another). Fresh fruit, juice, coffee, pastries, much more than the usual Hampton. Seating can be tight, but you can eat outside at the pool or take it back to your room.   Pool and hot tub is nice, small, but clean and comfortable. Plenty of clean fresh towels.   Not too many affordable hotels in the area, but this one is a real treat.
Manager Response: Hi Longingforord!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch,CA.  I am touched that you feel our hotel is one of the nicest Hamptons you've stayed in from the friendly service to the great breakfast and nice and clean pool and hot tub.  I'm glad to hear that you feel our hotel was a "real treat".  We look forward to your return the next time you are in this area.

Summary: The Hampton in Lake Forest is the place to stay.  They have good rates, and they staff do their best to make sure you are as comfortable as possible.  The rooms are clean, the internet is good, and you can't beat the complimentary breakfast - and lunch to go if you'd like.  I stay here for business trips, and they make it easy and comfortable.  Stay at the Hampton!
Manager Response: Hi 706triciah!  Thank you for your kind review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch, CA.  To say that we are the place to stay is so flattering! Thank you for mentioning the good rates, clean rooms, good internet, complimentary breakfast, including our "breakfast to go" bags when you are in a hurry to head to work.  I'm glad you felt that our staff do their best to make sure you are as comfortable as possible and that they make it easy and comfortable. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Wonderful staff, clean room and great breakfast.  A little out of the way but close to major freeways.  How clean the room is the most important thing to me and this hotel passed.  I am one of those people who bring a flash light to make sure there are no bed bugs!!  The staff is also great, always asking how our stay was and if everything was ok.
Manager Response: Hi Vicfinn!  Thank you so much for your fantastic review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest!  I am so happy you found that we have a wonderful staff, clean rooms and a great breakfast, complimentary of course!  Thank you for mentioning how the staff cares about your stay as well.  They are a great team!  We hope to see you back here again the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Looking for a clean, affordable stay in a desirable location? We found the Hampton Inn to exceed our desire.  Wonderful staff, convenient site with ample free parking, WIFI, superb breakfast (free) and nice room/beds.  Expected of a Hilton property and not disappointed!
Manager Response: Hi Bob G!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I'm so glad you found our hotel a great value and that we exceeded your desires with our wonderful staff, free parking, wifi, and complimentary breakfast and that you felt our rooms/beds were nice.  We look forward to your return the next time you are in this area.

Summary: We came to the area for a graduation at UC Irvine.  The location was excellent.  The hotel staff were very helpful in telling us where certain restaurants were located and answering questions about shopping.  Will definately recommend this hotel to friends and family.
Manager Response: Hi 92peggyl!  I'm glad you picked our hotel Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest for your visit to the area for a college graduation.  It's great that we were an excellent location for you and that you felt our hotel staff were very helpful regarding restaurants and shopping. I am so happy to hear that you will be recommending our hotel to your friends and family.  Please come back and stay with us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary: The check in staff was friendly.  Complimentary breakfast was nice.  It offers more choices than other complimentary breakfast.  Pool is not too big but it's nice, but it can get crowded at times.  Rooms are good size and nice and clean.
Manager Response: Hi Huong V!  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I am glad you felt the check in staff was friendly, the complimentary breakfast was nice with a lot a choices, and that the rooms were good size and nice and clean.  We hope you stay with us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn Lake Forest Does It Again..!!!
Summary: Another excellent stay. The staff here is extraordinary and Barbara in the breakfast area is first rate. Thanks..!!!! My wife and I will stay here every time we visit the Foothill Ranch area. There are some pretty special reasons why we visit this area and the Hampton Inn is a part of that.
Manager Response: Hi Barry B!  Thank you for your glowing review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest!  We are so glad you had yet another excellent stay and that you felt the staff was extraordinary.  Barbara was happy to see your comment!  We are happy to be one of your special reasons why you visit this area.  Looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Great experience, from check-in to wake up time, hotel is clean, quiet area and very well priced.  This was last minute reservation and it worked out well as I was playing in golf tournament in Costa Mesa and I won the next day, due to good's night rest.
Manager Response: Hi Frederick C!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest. I am thrilled you had a great experience with us and felt the hotel was clean, quiet area and very well priced. Congratulations on your win at the golf tournament!  We look forward to your return.

Summary: My family and I stayed there 3 days & nights.  Beautiful hotel! We had a great time!!  The rooms were very nice and clean and the Staff was warm and friendly.  Breakfast was great also along with the refreshing pool :-).  We would definitely stay there again.  Thank you all so much!! :-)
Manager Response: Hi Bob B!  Thank you for taking the time to review our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I am so happy you had a great time here at our hotel and that you think it is a beautiful hotel.  We were recently remodeled on the inside.  I am glad you felt the rooms were very nice and clean,  staff was warm and friendly, we had a great breakfast and a refreshing pool.  We look forward to your return in the future!

Summary: While the overall stay was good, here is a breakdown. Overall compared to other hotels in the area it is a good. Stayed 3 nights.   Pros: Digital Check in allowed me to select a room that worked best, great feature.  Good housekeeping, breakfast was fresh.  Cons:  Breakfast area is crowded, this is not just end of breakfast rush crowded, it was crowded at 6:30, 7:30 and 8am, on three separate days. Also lacking in breakfast meat department as the first day there was no meat.   Shower head was warn and could see hole in wall, hopefully maintenance will take care of the slight problems as overall the condition of the hotel was in good shape.
Manager Response: Hi Grant M!  We always appreciate reviews of our hotel, Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I'm so glad you liked the Digital Check in program.  It is nice to be able to select the room of your choice!  Thank you for mentioning that our housekeeping was good and the breakfast was fresh.  We do rotate on our hot food to go with the eggs-bacon, sausage, and potatoes every day so you have something different the next day.  Thank you for bringing attention to the shower head.  It has been brought to maintenance's attention and will be taken care of.  We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: very efficient and friendly staff and workers. Clean rooms with refrigerator and microwave. Great complimentary breakfast. The only issue we faced was with the digital check-in since it did not allow me to change rooms after the initial check-in. I had called in to request for the change when the online change request failed but the message was not conveyed to the staff and we ended up in 2 rooms which were in different floors
Manager Response: Hi Suntha L!  Thank you for reviewing our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest. I am happy you found our hotel staff and workers to be very efficient and friendly and that you felt the rooms were clean and you enjoyed our great complimentary breakfast.  We look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you are in this area.

Summary: This is a beautiful place that is well taken care of, the staff is cheery and very helpful,  rooms are very clean.  They are helpful with special needs. For the price it was a great deal,  I cant wait to go back just for the fun of it!
Manager Response: Hi Barbara C!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I am so glad you feel our hotel is well taken care of, that our staff is cheery and very helpful and our rooms are very clean.  Thank you for mentioning they our staff was helpful with special needs and our price is a great deal.  We can't wait to have you back at our hotel!

Summary: Always look forward to staying at the Hampton inn in Foot Hill Ranch California. Been coming there for several years and also have stayed at other Hampton's around the country. always a good experience and a good bargain for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us.  Thank you so much for your continued business! We are happy to be your hotel of choice when visiting the Foothill Ranch area.  We hope to see you soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary Heading: Okay Hotel, but lacking in customer service
Summary: I have generally had positive experiences at Hampton Inn, but this did not live up to my expectations.  The rooms and complimentary continental breakfast were okay.  And everything seemed clean (although one small issue was that there was a leak in the bathroom).   But... There were a few issues during our stay.  The biggest problem was that when I informed the hotel staff of the issues, I experienced resistance to helping resolve the issue, rather than eagerness to help resolve the issue. We checked in late at night and were placed in a king bed room with a chair, even though I reserved a king room with a sofa bed.  Since it was late when we checked in, I did not notify the front desk until the next morning.  The response I received from the staff member was "well, do you
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay.  I sincerely appreciate the detailed feedback you provided as it assists us greatly in targeting areas for improvement as well as identifying where additional training may be required. Your comments are invaluable.    Please accept my apologies for our failure to provide an experience that is consistent with Hampton Inn.  I have shared your comments with our team members and it was very impactful.  We know you have a choice when you travel.  I hope that you will allow us another opportunity to be of service to you and demonstrate the level of service I know we are capable of providing.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel for the price and great location, as located near several freeways and shopping centers.
Summary: We stay several times a year and always very pleased.  The hotel is always clean, very friendly and helpful staff! My husband is a retired Orange County Deputy Sheriff, so we have lots of family and friends in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the excellent review! We are so happy that we continue to be your home away from home whenever you are in the area.  I shared your comments with the staff earlier today and it really made their day. Thank you for recognizing them!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Great place to relax after a hard day at the office/work. Hotel was clean and very service detailed.  Our group will certainly be back next year. I would recommend this Hotel to friends and co-workers.
Manager Response: Thank you for another terrific review! We are so happy to be your hotel of choice year after year.  Thank you for recognizing our hotel associates for their service. It truly means a great a deal to them.  We hope your travels bring you back to the area sooner, but if not, we will see you next year!  Thank you for your continued business!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: This hotel is one of the best Hampton Inns! We stayed here in January 2015 and it was during the refurbishing if the hotel.  The staff was great then and still great now! We were greeted promptly and were recognized as honors members. We will stay here again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to make our hotel your hotel of choice when you visit the Irvine/Lake Forest area.    Our team was very appreciative of you taking the time to recognize them for their service. They, too, are very happy to have a newly renovated hotel.    We appreciate your business and continued loyalty to Hilton and the Hilton family of hotels.  We look forward to seeing you soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel In a great location
Summary: Everything from the rooms, staff, decor, location and amenities were great!! This is a very quiet hotel close to shopping and very scenic views. I would highly recommend this hotel for a business stay or family stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review about your recent stay.  We are so happy you enjoyed your visit and had the opportunity to explore the area. We look forward to being your hotel of choice whenever you visit the Lake Forest area.  Thank you again!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Close by, less than 10 minutes of my daily commute into Irvine. Hotel Staff was very friendly and courteous.   Rooms were clean and spacious, A/C works well. There was construction renovation in progress but was done discretely. Good selection of room and bedding available.  The complimentary breakfast, and staff was great and available every morning of my week long stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the terrific review! I am so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us.    We look forward to continuing to be your hotel of choice when you visit the Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Easy check-in/check-out, free and accessible parking and convenient breakfast times.  On the housekeeping end, I do find room for improvement. Upon arrival I noticed we had stained sheets and had lack of amenities in the bathroom (needed to go to the Front Desk to get shower cap, shampoo, etc.). The very comfortable bed made up for the mishaps.   Overall we had a pleasant experience at the Hampton Inn. Will stay here more so for convenience and affordability.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. I am delighted that you enjoyed your overall experience.  I appreciate the additional notes you provided regarding some Housekeeping items. I apologize that we did not meet the standards one would expect from a Hampton Inn. We have reviewed your feedback with our team and are certain it will assist us in our efforts to improve.  Again, thank you and we look forward to being of service to you in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Rooms are a bit sterile in décor...no draws in the dressed.. I was told they just went through a renovation.... too retro for my taste . Not "homey" at all. Good for a nights rest then hit the road... I would pick a different place for stays od a week or longer.
Manager Response: Hi Larry N!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  We appreciate your feedback.  We now have 3 drawers in our cabinet for our guests thanks to input from guests such as yourself!  I really do hope you come back and try us again.  The room décor may not be to your liking but our wonderful staff will make you feel at home.

Summary: As others mentioned...no drawers. I went to the front desk with the hope they were still remodeling but unfortunately this is by design. One small wire slide out tray which is tapered so you can't even fit two shirts side by side. and it is not a deep tray so you can't stack items well. This became my sock "drawer". It's not good for anything else.  Forced to live out of my suitcase for the week, clean and dirty clothes all in my bag.   Walls are barren, hair dryer is laying on a counter in the bathroom rather than wall mounted. Two small roll out ottomans under a desk which I found are supposed to be a place to put my luggage. I wouldn't have guessed this except the staff told me the intended purpose. Really? So the guest needs to roll out two pieces of furniture? Why not one
Manager Response: Hi Sal5608! Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  We appreciate all feedback, good and bad, so that we can improve our services for the future. Thank you for mentioning that the staff is wonderful.  We feel it is very important that you have that pleasant experience with our staff.  As of the drawers, they have come back and put a total of 3 drawers inside the cabinet so you should now have plenty of room to unpack.  The cube ottomans actually serve a dual purpose: to be used as a luggage rack together placed along a wall in the room or can be used for extra seating when you have guests in the room.  I hope that you will reconsider and stay with us again the next time you are in this area.

Summary: The remodel at this location has replaced traditional furniture with more contemporary units and there are NO dresser drawers in the rooms. Very inconvenient. I would not stay at this location again because of this. Other than that, this was a very clean and easy to reach location. The other amenities there were better than most.
Manager Response: Hi Ron W!  We appreciate your review of the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch, CA. Thank you for mentioning that our hotel was very clean and easy to reach location and the amentities were better than most.  The drawer situation has been remedied!  We now have three drawers inside our new cabinet.  I hope that you will give us another try the next time you are staying in the area.

Summary: Our hotel of choice when traveling state side is Hampton.  Our recent stay in Lake Forest, CA was extremely satisfying.  We had a little trouble understanding that the knobs on our air conditioner were removed because they were replaced by a thermostat on the opposite wall; and we did not know how to get the fridge cold; but the front desk comped us one of our night stays for our mild discomfort.
