Manager Response: Hi randijim!  Thank you for your review with TripAdvisor.  It makes me happy that your stay was extremely satisfying.  I'm glad we figured out the issue with the thermostat and fridge.  We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: This was my second stay at this Hampton Inn.  I really like this place.  The location is perfect because of the easy access to  many freeways, restaurants, and shops.    The staff is one of the best that I have encountered.  They are very friendly, helpful, understanding, and efficient.   The front desk personnel exceeded my expectations.  At times, this stay was a challenge due to the renovation and construction taking place.    The lobby area was sometimes noisy, and it was quite dusty and sparse.  But, there were a few beautiful chairs which alluded to what was to be.   The room was comfortable and attractive;  I do not know if it had been refurbished.   The only negative with the room was that there was no drawer space. It had a very odd shelving unit that was attached to a
Manager Response: Hi VacationingChris!  Thank you for your review of our hotel Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I am happy you saw the good with the hotel-the very friendly, helpful,understanding and efficient staff, comfortable beds and room, beautiful new chairs in the lobby as well as the front desk staff exceeding your expectations!  The drawer space has been solved and now we have 3 drawers inside the cabinet. Now that the dust and noise has settled, we would love to have you come back and stay with us again when you are in the area.

Summary: I usually enjoy a Hampton stay, but this one was a little rough.  There was construction, and they were bringing new furniture, etc.  I was trying to do some work and attend meetings, and kept getting a knock on the door because there were no "Do Not Disburb" signs.  Don't remember the last time I stayed at a hotel that didn't have them.  Also, tough to control the temperature.  Either too hot or too cold.  May be better after the construction is over.
Manager Response: Hi 706triciah!  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch, CA.  Your feedback is important to us.  I'm sorry that your stay was a little rough.  You must have come when we were receiving a bulk of our furniture.  I apologize that you were disturbed due to the Do Not Disturb sign that was missing. We have extras at the front desk and would have brought you one up right away.  I do hope you come back and stay with us again in the future now that the construction is over.

Summary Heading: Nice Place that will be better after renovations are complete.
Summary: Stayed here the last four days in March 2015. In fact, extended my stay while at the hotel.   The hotel tell is nice, rooms are clean and the staff was helpful and pleasant.  Renovations are going on at this time and the common areas are not as clean as they would be otherwise.  Renovations are supposed to be complete by April 30, 2015.  The breakfast was adequate.   Only negative I see is that the room didn't really have any drawers.  During my stay they installed some pullout metal baskets that could be used for storage.  But I think if you're looking for a place where you can unpack all your luggage and stay for a few days, this is not that place.  I think the hotel should look at correcting this situation.  There is closet space for hanging things but not adequate drawer
Manager Response: Hi Richieblsafe!  Thank you for reviewing our hotel, Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I'm glad you felt the hotel was nice, rooms were clean and the staff was helpful and pleasant and especially that you extended your stay with us!  We are looking into the wire drawer situation and appreciate your input to pass onto the designers.  We would love for you to come back and see the finished product of the remodel the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Nothing negative to say about this hotel. Good location. Room, lobby and halls were clean and appeared to be well taken care of. Great breakfast. Nothing fancy, but plenty to eat, fresh, constantly re-stocked, and free. Everyone working here was very friendly. Only negative was noise coming from next door. But not the hotels fault. Just inconsiderate neighbors. I would give this 5 stars, but I save my 5 stars to hotels that go above and beyond the expected. For the price, you get what you pay for. This is not an expense hotel, so don't expect luxury. But based on the price of other hotels in the area, all about the same price, you get your money's worth. I would definitely stay here again, and would recommend it to anyone staying in the area.
Manager Response: Hi Goldwebco!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest. It made my day when you said there was nothing negative to say about the hotel, the room, lobby, and halls were clean and well taken care of and that the staff were very friendly.  I'm glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well.  We look forward to having you back again real soon!

Summary: Good location Staff is very helpful with the very young and the elderly. Breakfast staff was very helpful. Staff was excited that my daughter had a baby and gave my granddaughter lots of extras! Hotel is going through a remodel. More modern and some interesting new styles.
Manager Response: Hi Linda E L!  We appreciate you taking the time to write this review of Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I'm glad you found our hotel a good location and that you felt our breakfast staff was helpful.  I'm also glad your granddaughter felt special during your visit. Our guests are like family to us!  We are going through a remodel, that's true. I'm glad you liked the more modern feel and interesting new styles.  We look forward to you coming back to visit.

Summary: Comforter had been washed way too many times and was in large lumps of polyester with then sections with no filling.  Pillows tired and flat.  When I asked manager about it, I was told the bedding was "supposed to be that way"  He then offered a different room, where the bedding was better, but still not good.  Under construction with debris all down the hallways, never vacuumed the 3 days we were there.  Rooms are sparely decorated, cold looking, dirty windows, ill operating heat/cooling.  The breakfast was good and nicely served with a very helpful attendant.  The pool area was nice as well.
Manager Response: Hi RandeeLouRD!  I appreciate your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I am sorry you had a bad experience at our property.  Renovations can be stressful to go through but we look forward to the finished product. The rooms now have the extra accents that were lacking during your stay.  We are in the process of ordering more new duvet inserts for a smoother look.  I'm glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our breakfast attendant as well as our sparkling pool.  Please do come back when you are in the area again and see our finished hotel.

Summary: From the time I arrived until the time I left all of the staff I interacted with were professional, friendly, and efficiently helpful. I wish I had remembered everyone's name to give a personal thank you. The pleasantness of the staff, the ease of the administration of hotel stays, coupled with the beautiful weather made for a great business trip. This is at the same time the hotel was undergoing renovations which resulted in a lot of dust and maneuvering - the hotel staff did a great job of minimizing the impact of the construction.
Manager Response: Hi Lorrie P!  Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch, CA.  I liked your title "great experience" because that is exactly what we want to give each and every one of our guests at our hotel!  Thank you for your kind comment regarding the staff being professional, friendly, and efficiently helpful.  That means a lot to each and everyone here at the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I'm glad you had beautiful weather while you were here as well which is always a plus.  I appreciate that you mentioned the hotel staff did a great job of minimizing the impact of the construction during our renovation which resulted in a lot of dust and maneuvering.  We hope that the next time you are in this area, whether for work or pleasure, you stay with us once again.

Summary: No prior notice of above mentioned remodeling. Sensitivity to dust could affect you. Arrival with baggage across work area in lobby could cause tripping. Construction workers at different floor levels carrying supplies and tools somewhat disruptive.
Manager Response: Hi Jesus R!  Thank you for reviewing our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I am sorry you didn't see our renovation notice on our website.  We have been in renovation since January.  As you know, with any renovation, it can get pretty messy and dusty!  I'm sorry you experienced the busiest part of the renovation-the lobby.  We are so happy with the outcome of our beautiful new flooring and furnishings!  I certainly hope when you come back to the area, you will come stay with us and see the finished product and have a better experience

Summary: A great hotel central to the Southern California area.  The staff go out of their way to be sure that guests are satisfied and happy.  The hotel is newly renovated and updated.  A very nice place to stay!
Manager Response: Hi Jacquelyn E!  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch, CA.  I'm glad you mentioned that our great hotel is centrally located in Southern California.  It makes me happy that you felt the staff go out of their way to be sure that guests are satisfied and happy.  We are putting the finishing touches on our renovated hotel and are very excited about the update!  Please come back and see us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Even though this hotel is going through a remodel, they were kind, courteous and helpful. My room had already been refurbished and it was a great stay. There are a number of good restaurants within driving range. It was close to the business I was working with and I was able to meet with another exec at a close by Starbucks.
Manager Response: Hi Rodney W!  We appreciate your review of the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  I'm glad you had a great stay in your refurbished room and that you felt the staff were kind, courteous and helpful.  It is great that you were close to the business you were working with and that you mentioned a number of good restaurants within driving range.  We hope you will be back to the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest the next time you are in the area.

Summary: There was very limited availability, which is why we stayed at this location. I felt it was a bit overpriced.  We arrived quite late, and after parking on the side of the building we entered  through the side door and had to make our way through a remodeling/construction wing of the hotel that probably should have been closed off to guests. Staff was very nice, the beds were comfy, and the shower was hot...all the most important needs were met.
Manager Response: Hi Renee H! Thank you for taking the time to write this review of the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  I am truly sorry for the inconvenience of entering through the side door through the construction zone.  Yes, this should have been closed off to guests!  On the other hand, I'm glad that all your important needs were met like nice staff, comfy beds and hot water in the shower.  We do hope you will come back after our renovation is complete (mid-March) and experience our like-new hotel.  I know all of the staff at the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest are looking forward to it!

Summary: I stayed at the Hampton Irvine for a business trip. Although it was not off the main highway, it was near a shopping center and many restaurants which made the stay easier. The hotel itself is very nice; classic Hampton. It was a little pricey for a weeknight, but that is probably because I reserved my room the day before.
Manager Response: Hi Jan C!  Thank you for taking the time to review our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  I appreciate you mentioning that although we are 6 miles from the major highway, we are near many restaurants and a shopping center.  The price fluctuates, depending on day of the week and occupancy of the hotel.  We hope next time you are in the area, you will once again stay with us.

Summary: Stayed here even though it was farther away from my business site.  Area has many restaurants and easy walking to many of them.  This hotel is currently under renovation but the hotel staff was more than helpful and willing to help. I will stay here again when I return to this area.
Manager Response: Hi Bill H!  Thank you for reviewing the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest on Tripadvisor.  I am glad that you felt our staff was more than helpful and willing to help during our renovation.  We are all excited to see the final results by next month!  Thank you for pointing out that we are walking distance to many restaurants in the area.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: We visited lake forest California for the first time,and we stayed in this hotel, wow it was in a nice location close to shopping and restaurants. The place is nice tidy and all the staff is very very nice front desk are very helpful, all of them. Very accommodating people even housekeeping ladies are very pleasant. And everyone of us esp, my little boys loves the breakfast and Barbara she's very nice with the kids, they've even talk about how this miss her. We would definitely go back, and i will recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Summer M!   Thank you so much for your incredible review of our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest!  It makes me happy that you felt our hotel was tidy, front desk staff were very helpful and housekeeping ladies were very pleasant.  I'm glad you loved the breakfast and how Barbara, our breakfast hostess, was very nice with the kids.  She will be so happy to hear that your boys miss her!  Thank you for recommending the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: We have stayed at this Hampton Inn a number of times in the past few years.  It is an excellent facility with exceptionally competent staff that provide outstanding service.  Outstanding breakfast choices and presentation; very clean rooms; reasonable price; quiet; fine location.  Even with the current remodeling project going on there are no disruptions or inconveniences.  We will go here again soon.
Manager Response: Hi Paul B!  Thank you for your wonderful review to our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  We are so happy that you have stayed here a number of times.  I'm glad you feel our hotel has exceptionally competent staff that provide outstanding service and that we have outstanding breakfast choices and presentation as well as very clean rooms at a reasonable price.  Thank you for mentioning our current remodeling project.  We are all so excited about our future remodeled rooms and lobby to be completed in March!  It's good to know that you did not feel any disruptions during your stay.  We look forward to you coming  back and visiting usand see the completed project!

Summary: The location for us was great and the staff was very helpful. Food was great! There was 3 couples and they accommodated us to be on the same floor and close to each other. There is a Hilton Garden Inn next door, so we went over there to have a glass of wine in the evening.
Manager Response: Hi Margaret A O!  Thank you for taking the time to review our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  I'm glad the location worked out for you, our staff was helpful and the complimentary breakfast was great.  I'm happy that we were able to get your rooms close to each other.  The front desk always tries their best to accomodate our guests whether single room or group of rooms.  Thanks for pointing out that the Hilton Garden Inn is right next door with a bar/restaurant available in the evenings for our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest guests.  We hope the next time you are in the area, you once again stay with us.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times, as we have family and friends in the surrounding areas.  The staff is always friendly and helpful. The rooms are always clean. There are great attractions within easy driving range and very good shopping within a short distance.  This hotel is near several freeways and both San Diego and Los Angeles are both only about 2 hrs away.
Manager Response: Hi Frances V!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  It gives me great pleasure that you are one of our many repeat guests!  I am glad you feel our staff is always friendly and helpful and that the rooms are always clean. Thank you for pointing out that there are great attractions within easy driving range and that we are near several freeways making Los Angeles and San Diego easily reached from our hotel.  We look forward to having you back again the next time you visit your family and friends.

Summary: While visiting family in and around the Lake Forest area during the holidays, my husband and I seem to always stay here.  Why?  Plain and simple:  you can't beat it!  Friendly staff, comfortable and clean rooms, and free breakfast that satisfies our tastes.  During our visit over the Christmas holiday, we were once again more than happy with our stay.   All at a good rate I might add.
Manager Response: Hi camred!  Thank you for reviewing the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest on the TripAdvisor site.  We are so grateful to have you as a repeat guest!  I am glad you feel we have a friendly staff, that we have comfortable and clean rooms, and, of course our fabulous complimentary breakfast.  We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: As always Hampton delivers. clean rooms, great location and a generous breakfast!! There is always coffee , tea and fruit in the lobby. This location was within walking distance to shopping and restaurants. It is located right off the toll road for easy access.
Manager Response: Hi Jose H!  Thank you for taking the time to write your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  I am very proud that we delivered on the Hampton standard of clean rooms, great location and generous breakfast as well as the complimentary 24 hour access to coffee, tea and fruit in the lobby!  Thank you for mentioning that shopping and restaurants being walking distance away.  We hope you come back and stay with us again when you are in the area.

Summary: I can't believe this is a Hampton inn the staff is superior friendly courteous and helpful everything is lovely and the "continental" breakfast is good and filling.  Great value and a great stay ,for some reason trip advisor keeps telling me that this review wasn't 200 characters so I will keep writing
Manager Response: Hi KunniB!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  I'm glad you found the staff to be super friendly, courteous and helpful.  I'm also happy you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast which has quite a variety for everyone's tastes and that you found our hotel a great value.  We do hope you come back and stay with us again the next time you are in this area.

Summary: What a welcome surprise! It is easy to see why this hotel is number "1" in its market! A must stay when visiting Irvine - Lake Forest area for business or pleasure! Close to shops and easy access to interstates.  Hotel is very well appointed, clean and lives up to the Hampton standard we've come to expect! But the true JEWEL of this hotel is the amazing staff! Every team member I encountered was Outstanding! Management has done a great job to find "genuine...lead from the heart associates..." Everyone was truly top notch! Thank you to all for making our vacation such a memorable experience! Best to All!
Manager Response: Hi Belinda D!  Your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest truly made my day! Thank you for stating that we were well appointed, clean and lived up to the Hampton standard that you've come to expect.  I truly appreciate you calling our staff the" true jewel" of the hotel.  We are very proud of these "genuine, lead from the heart" associates.  I couldn't have said it better myself!  I am so glad you had a memorable experience at the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest and hope you will come back and stay with us again the next time you are in this area.

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable, good stay for the basics
Summary: This hotel is clean and comfortable.  This hotel gets a average rating largely because it's just a standard hotel stay.  The hotel seems a little dated, the pool was very dirty (I could feel all the sand in the bottom of the hot tub and breakfast was just okay.  This is a good hotel for a short stay but not real conducive to a family trip. The parking is small, and there isn't really anything within walking distance.  I would stay again, if it's a short trip.
Manager Response: Hi Becky K!  Thank you for  your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  I am happy you felt our hotel was clean and comfortable.  I'm sorry the pool was dirty which was addressed with maintenance. There is quite a bit of parking all the way around our hotel and we share parking with the Hilton Garden Inn next door to us.  Within less than a mile, there is over a dozen restaurants, shopping centers and a movie theatre, all within walking distance.  I am glad to see that you would stay at the Hampton Inn Irvine/Lake Forest again. We look forward to having you back!

Summary: During my Fri/Sat, two-night stay at this hotel, all the hotel staff were very courteous and helpful.  Especially Rick!  The room was clean (most important to me), beds were comfortable and the room did have everything it was supposed to have.  The building itself is a bit old and creaky, and I am glad I listened to the advice of another TripAdvisor reviewer and asked for the 3rd floor.  The only downfall to that was the elevator was out of service!  And stayed that way for the entire stay.  The good news is I got exercise, but it was a bit of a hassle.  Overall, a decent stay.
Manager Response: Hi Michelle D!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  I'm glad you felt the staff were very courteous and helpful-especially Rick and that you found your room to be clean with everything it was supposed to have as well as the beds being comfortable.  I am truly sorry about the elevator issue and what a hassle it was for you.  We tried to get it fixed as soon as we possibly could but had an issue getting the part needed to fix it.  It is now running just fine.  We hope to have you back when the elevator is running next time you are in the area.

Summary: thank you for the great stay.  All of the staff was wonderful and very friendly.  We will return soon and will use your hotel. The Pool was nice and clean.  We loved that we could sit outside and eat breakfast.  Room was clean and comfortable, nothing fancy just a good clean place to stay with great staff.
Manager Response: Hi Marie T!  Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  I am happy you had a great stay and felt the staff was wonderful and friendly.  I'm glad you were able to enjoy sitting outside and have our complimentary breakfast by our nice, clean pool.  We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn at  Foothills Ranch, CA
Summary: Quiet setting.  Away from the hustle and bustle of LA.  Within walking distance to restaurants, shopping and more. Hotel staff are extremely friendly and helpful. Beds are super comfortable. Full complimentary hot breakfast. Will definitely return!
Manager Response: Hi Mary A. V!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch,CA.  I'm glad you feel we are a quite setting, away from the hustle and bustle.  Being next to the Saddleback mountains, it does feel that way, along with the restaurants and shopping being within walking distance which is convenient.  I am happy you felt the staff were extremely friendly and helpful, beds were super comfortable, and that you enjoyed our full complimentary hot breakfast.  We look forward to your return to the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest!

Summary: The hotel elevator did not work when we arrived and we had to walk up stairs with two small children to deliver our luggage.  When we got to the room the front desk called and complained we were noisy.  It was not a priority to tell us the elevator was fixed.
Manager Response: Hi Michael H!  Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  We appreciate feedback, whether good or bad.  We did have a problem with the elevator while you were here the first few days and I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.  The part needed to fix it was not readily available and had to be ordered from out of state.  We are happy that it is now up and running just fine.  I am truly sorry it put a damper on your trip.  We hope you will give us another opportunity in the future to have a better experience with us.

Summary: Staff was very friendly and helpful when they had the time. Rooms are out dated and the place needs fresh paint. The carpet feels sticky through out. The air conditioner cycled on and off continually throughout the night the room never really got as comfortable as I prefer, but it did get to 70 degrees, which for most is probably ok.  There was a large group traveling together that demanded  a lot of attention from the staff. This left those not part of the large group to fend for themselves
Manager Response: Hi Mark H!  Thank you for reviewing the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch,CA.  I am happy you felt the staff was very friendly and helpful.  I'm sorry if a large group took the attention of the staff away from you.  We want everyone to feel welcome and cared for.  The Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest is up for a refresh at the beginning of next year and look forward to having you back to experience that.

Summary: Thank you for a wonderful stay! I stayed at this property for business and found the location to be very agreeable to both business and pleasure. The staff is excellent and truly cares about the needs of their customers
Manager Response: Hi CaliShel!  Thank you for your review of our property, Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch, CA.  I am so happy you had a wonderful stay!  Thank you for pointing out that although you were here for business, it is an agreeable location to both business and pleasure.  I'm glad you thought our staff was excellent and cared about the needs of our customers. That is a huge compliment to us all!  I hope your next business trip to this area brings you back to our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.

Summary: I was expecting more of an upgraded hotel, room and breakfast area due to the location of this hotel.  The staff was great, though, so no major complaints.  I always stay at Hampton Inn's for business, just not 100% happy with this one.
Manager Response: Hi Jane M!  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor.  I'm happy that you felt the staff was great here at the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  I'm sorry you were a bit disappointed that we were not upgraded.  We will be receiving a renovation in the near future which will upgrade some of our features.  I hope you will like the newer, improved Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in the future.

Summary: I frequent Hampton Inn due to the complimentary breakfast and the hotel staffs appear genuine.  They offer assistance, however are not over bearing.  anything that was required during my trip was given and the staff greeted me and gave farewell upon my departure.
Manager Response: Hi Kimberly E!  Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  I'm so happy you find us (and all Hampton Inns) extremely accommodating, enjoy the complimentary breakfast and especially the staff being genuine. We take pride in greeting our guests hello and goodbye as you are coming to and going from the hotel.  We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Great place to hang your hat!!
Summary: This hotel is great!!  The staff is very friendly and professional.  The services are nice with a complimentary breakfast (everyday) and dinner during the week.  They provide shuttle service to the airport and more importantly to Legoland.  I highly recommend this hotel for anyone staying in that area.
Manager Response: Hi Kevin Mark B!  Thank you for your review of our hotel, Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest.  I would like to take credit for this review because you complimented our staff for being friendly and professional (which they are) and for the complimentary breakfast (which we have).  You also mentioned 2 things we do not have-a complimentary dinner or complimentary shuttle service to Legoland. Perhaps you stayed at another Hampton Inn? In any case, I'm glad you enjoyed the Hampton Experience whether it was here or another place and hope you come back to our hotel, Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch in the future.

Summary: Over all good experience but lacked customer service when checking in. We were met by Michael the front office staff who was rude, over talked me during check in.  The room accommodation was good, clean what I expected from the pic on the internet.  Pool area was clean but pool itself was small but accommodating for children.  Pool area needed more chairs and umbrellas for shade.  Breakfast was complimentary but lacked protein "no beef or pig".  Elevator was slow both coming and going.  Hotel was central to many shops ie Target, Walmart etc for last minute supply needs
Manager Response: Hi Freddie B!  Thank you for your review of our hotel, the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch.  While it was a mixed review, I appreciate your constructive comments and will address them with the appropriate departments. I'm glad you had an overall good experience feeling the rooms were good and clean as well as the pool area and how we are central to many shops for last minute supply needs.  As for the complimentary breakfast, we do offer breakfast meats such as sausage and bacon as well as potatoes.  They are on a rotating basis so you must have been to breakfast on a day where the "breakfast meats" were not offered. I'm sorry you were disappointed with that.  We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Im a loyal Hampton Inn HHonors member so I stay @ the Hampton most of the time when traveling. I would not say this is the best nor would I say its the worst Hampton I have stayed it... its average for a Hampton.
Manager Response: Hi Donald B!  Thank you for reviewing the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch.  I'm glad to hear you are a loyal Hampton Inn guest!  We hope you will come stay with us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Very little or no kids programming and no menu on TV.  You'll hate this. This is the age of DVR's, Netflix, and streaming video you'll be amazed by this what you see is what you get offering and (some of) our kids will crawl the walls without animated programs on TV.
Manager Response: Hi Charles S!  I appreciate you taking the time to review our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch.  I am discouraged that you feel young families should stay away from our hotel due to the television programming.  We do have quite a few cable stations to choose from although you are right, many are not appropriate for younger children.  We do have the Disney channel as well as Nickelodeon which offer wonderful animated programs. Outside of television, we have our pool as well as many wonderful parks in the area that your children may enjoy.  Should you choose to stay with us again which I hope you do, please stop by the front desk and they would be happy to give those options.

Summary: Marie Ferguson at the front desk was so helpful to us.  Exercise room was pretty small, but the hot tub was nice. Beds were very comfortable.  There is a Circle K gas station and a Target store really close by.
Manager Response: Hi 668lgal! Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch.  I'm glad you felt the beds were comfortable and you enjoyed the hot tub.  Thank you for pointing out the close gas station and Target.  There are many great restaurants within 1 mile of the hotel as well.  I'm glad that I was helpful to you during your stay and hope that you will come back and stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: I usually don't stay out in Foothill Ranch due to fact it is rather far from where I need to work, however the last time I did I must commend the front desk staff, friendly, concerned and very appreciative of issues I had with housekeeping.  I am not the type of traveler that airs my issues on a travel site unless the staff can not take care of them.  Not the case with Hampton Inn Irvine. Actually the front desk staff was surprised when I did not come down on the first day of my issue.  As any good traveler should, I gave housekeeping the benefit of the doubt.  When issues where not taken care of and there were repeat offenses, I went to the front desk. All handled and done in a professional nature.  Thank you Hampton Inn Irvine.
Manager Response: Hi Getawaygalsd!   Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch.  I'm glad you decided to stay at our hotel! I appreciate you commending our front desk staff being friendly, concerned, and appreciative of your housekeeping issues.  I'm glad we found you a nice quiet room. Thank you for your "thumbs up".

Summary: Marie was wonderful to me and my family. Very impressed how clean everything was. Dining was a pleasure and the food was terrific. Marie recommended a few restaurants in the area and our choice was enjoyable. Cookies were the topper to our stay. Thanks
Manager Response: Hi Karen A!  Thank you for your review.  I am glad you were impressed how clean everything was and you enjoyed the food as well as the cookies.  I'm glad you enjoyed the restaurant you went to with our recommendations.  We sure have plenty of them to choose from within a mile of our hotel! Finally, I appreciate your kind personal comments.  You made my day!  Please come back and stay with us again at the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch.  We would love to have you back!

Summary: I expected more from this hotel. Right of the bat, I was put in a handicapped room which I never requested, which meant a ground room with people walking right outside. When I asked to be moved, they said take it up with Hotels.com. The room itself seemed like it could use updated curtains and the bathroom especially. Also, the hot tub was being worked on so that wasn't even available. My favorite part was the breakfast.
Manager Response: Hi Sandra Z!  I'm sorry you were discouraged about your room upon arrival.  3rd party reservations do usually book our accessible rooms because they are our last king rooms available but I do apologize if the front desk agent came across to you in the wrong way.  We do generally have a friendly front desk. We are due for a renovation in the near future which will update our rooms and lobby.  Our hot tub needed to cure for 30 days after re-plastering but  is now working just fine. I am sorry for the inconvenience.  We hope you will give our hotel another try in the future.

Summary: Overall a nice hotel however:  My first room was already pre-occupied so they gave me the room next to the elevator which sounded like creeky old door always moved... Creepy.  My company pre-paid for the room and sent of CC authorization form. They ended up charging my personal CC that they needed to have on file.   Hot tub was out of commission and was told i could use the Sister Companies next door (no thanks - kids running/playing everywhere so no relaxation time)  Like i said, overall a nice place and staff were friendly but they have a long ways to go to be a 'bulletproof' hotel with not mistakes.
Manager Response: Hi Jaime H!  Thank you for reviewing our hotel.  I apologize for the inconveniences that occurred during your stay with us. I assure you the appropriate measures have been taken so that those issues will not happen again in the future.  Unfortunately, you came while our hot tub was being cured due to re-plastering but is now up and running just fine.  I do hope you will give us another opportunity to give a proper representation of the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch,CA.

Summary: Price is kind of reasonable range with complimentary parking, breakfast and wifi.  Pool is available outside and you will be able to get some Calisunshine during your stay.  Location is a little isolated but it doesn't bother me at all.  It takes about 20 min from SNA airport to this hotel by car. 25 mins to Angels statium and 21 mins to famous Laguna Beach.  There is a convinent store/gas station next door and I don't worry about gas and food searching. Walking down the parking lot it will connect to a short trail and you can do jogging or BMX there. Love this hotel and definitely want to stay again next time.
Manager Response: Hi Po-Jung H! Thank you for your review of our hotel. I'm glad you liked our amenities such as complimentary parking, breakfast and wifi and that you enjoyed our beautiful, re-plastered pool. We are centrally located in Orange County with most attractions being as close as 20 minutes from the hotel.  I hope you consider staying with us again the next time you come to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Wouldn't change a thing.  Great visit.  Clean rooms and friendly staff
Summary: Location was very convenient to the highway yet quiet.  I had room 101 and I would recommend.  Didn't hear a thing from outside and very little from upstairs.  Bed was comfortable, A/C worked well and wasn't too noisy (rare these days it seems).   Breakfast was more than a defrosted muffin or toast - scrambled eggs, sausage and a plethora of carbs to choose from.  All in all, a good stay.
Manager Response: Hi VancouverWAtraveler! Thank you for your review.  I'm glad you found the location convenient, your room clean and quiet (including AC) and bed comfortable. I'm happy you enjoyed our wide variety of our complimentary breakfast as well as our friendly staff.  Please come back and visit us at the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch when you are in this area again.

Summary: I spent 4 nights at the Hampton Inn (East Irvine/Foothill Ranch) and enjoyed every minute.  The location was perfect (10 miles from the office in Laguna Niguel) and very little traffic.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Hi William D!  We're glad your recent stay was a good one and that you enjoyed every minute!  Thank you for mentioning how the location was perfect. We can't always promise little traffic but glad you experienced that! I hope you do stay at the Hampton Inn Irvine/East Lake Forest in Foothill Ranch again when you come back to this area.

Summary Heading: Staff courteous, a bit pricey, clean room, bedding needs updating,
Summary: Stayed for 1 week, the desk staff wer extremely helpful, same for the breakfast attendent. Food selection was as expected. Complimentary internet worked, dropped out only once, bit slow - not recommended for streaming. Used the lobby computer for printing twice, worked good. Room was clean and housekeeping was as expected. The bed cover was lumpy as it has probably been washed too often, should be replaced. Free parking. Fresh cookies at night. Bagged take away lunch for those who wanted it. Some HD channels on TV. Did not use the outdoor pool. Biggest gripe was the lack of bottled water in the rooms. And the A/C made a strange gurgling noise evertime it stopped and started. Found it a bit pricey for what it was, but it was the only available room in the area for that week.
Manager Response: Hi TansRFading!  Thank you for your review. We are glad you felt our front desk staff extremely helpful as well as our breakfast attendant. I am happy that you used our business center computer which worked good and that you commented on our clean rooms.  We hope you will be back again sometime in the near future.

Summary: We were passing through the area and chose the Hampton Inn Irvine / East Lake Forest for a night. The front desk attendant was pleasant and very quick & efficient for our late 10:30 PM check-in.  The room was large with two queen beds, a small refrigerator and microwave, and standard furniture. The bathroom was also very spacious. Everything (room + bathroom) was very clean! I was particularly impressed with the bathroom as I am normally one to travel with my own hand soap and disinfecting wipes. There really wasn't a view (parking lot / pool) but I did not expect one in this type of central area.  Breakfast was standard for a Hampton Inn with small, baked omelettes, bacon, waffles, oatmeal, fruit, and other continental items. The hotel is located near several shopping centers
Manager Response: Hi Christine D!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest. I am glad that you felt our front desk attendant was pleasant, quick and efficient! I am happy that you also felt the rooms and the bathroom were spacious and clean. That is important to us here at the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  We hope if you come back through this area again in the future that you will once again stay with us!

Summary: I wanted to take a moment and write to you about our most recent stay at your property (Hampton Inn Foothill Ranch).  We made a call prior to arriving (2:00) and we made sure we could check in early.  We pulled up at 2:30 and I went in and asked for a room on the third floor. The gentleman said yes but when I looked at the eoom number on the card holder it said 217. He informed me that it was the only room clean in the entire hotel. We left and came back and my Wife went inside to ask if now there were any other rooms clean (it was now 4:30). Again he said no and gave us the key for 216. We loaded the cart and we went up to 216. Upon entering the room, it was occupied by another guest! We had barged in on them! My Wife (who is nine months pregnant and having contractions) went
Manager Response: Hi Paul M!  Thank you for your review.  I sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you encountered during your stay at the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  We strive to make sure all our guests receive the room they were expecting as well as a smooth check in.  Each department involved has been notified to make sure this will not happen again.  I appreciate your feedback and do hope that you would allow us another opportunity in the future to give a better representation of the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.

Summary: The breakfast bar attendant was the best I've seen. She was very attentive and friendly! :-) Everything else was good providing you didn't want to use the internet near the pool, just outside the breakfast area or workout. There was only an elliptical and a treadmill tucked in a very small area, just off the pool. The area was very cramped
Manager Response: Hi Edward A. B!  We appreciate your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I am thrilled you felt Barbara, the breakfast attendant was the best you've seen! She is very attentive and friendly and a great example of how our entire staff operates.  I have shown her your comment which made her very happy.  Thank you for letting me know about the weak internet connection outside.  I am looking into it with our internet provider.  You will happy to know that our gym will be moved to a bigger area within the next couple of years.  We hope to have you back at the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest to see that happen.

Summary Heading: Great desk employees, not so great housekeeping
Summary: Easy to find.  Checkin was fantastic.  Matthew greeted us and was awesome.  On our 2nd day, we were going to a wedding and my husband forgot his tie.  I asked Matthew where we could go to buy one.  He imediately took off HIS tie and handed it to me.  WOW  Housekeeping was not so great.  Only left 1 towel in bathroom.  Had an empty tissue box, so I placed it one the counter for them to see.  Nope, threw box away, but didn't replace it.  Pool Area clean.  Just had to ask for towels as bin was always empty.
Manager Response: Hi bearturtle!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I'm thrilled you had a fantastic checkin and that Matthew went up and beyond in lending his tie to you! I have shared your comment with him which made him very happy.  As for the housekeeping issues, you can be assured they have been addressed and will not happen in the future.  Please come back and see us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary: We choose this Hampton Inn because of location.  Staff are friendly and helpful.  We stay at third floor, using the indoor stair to get in and out of hotel through keyed side entrant.  Plenty of parking spots event when hotel is fully booked. Room is clean, no smell of smoking. We have been to many Hampton Inn before but this 2 day stay is the best. The 3 story building looks new and spacious.  We did not try any of the amenities.  Only negative thing is the slow elevator near front desk.
Manager Response: Hi 352dn!  Thank you for reviewing our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest property here on TripAdvisor. I'm glad you chose us because of the location and that you felt the staff were friendly and helpful as well as the rooms were clean.  We look forward to your next visit with the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.

Summary: My family chose this hotel since it was close to relatives we were visiting. I initially thought it was out of the way, but it's great! Most theme parks are only 20 minutes away and the location is away from most LA traffic. There are many shopping areas and restaurants nearby. The room was clean and the free breakfast made it worth staying here, although I do wish they had a larger dining room. The staff were very friendly and accommodating, especially front desk! Stay here, you won't be disappointed!
Manager Response: Hi angelmyth!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Foothill Ranch.  We are thrilled that your mind was changed about our hotel being out of the way vs very accessible to Theme parks, shopping and restaurants!  Thank you for commenting about our staff being very friendly and accommodating, clean room and of course, our complimentary breakfast.  We are happy you stayed with us and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Family Oriented, Great Location, Staff, ammenities
Summary: We had four individual families stay at this Hampton Inn for a family reunion/vacation the week of July 4th.  The location is right off the toll road for easy access.  It's a quiet, safe location, close to shopping, restaurants, and beach cities, but not in the middle of the rush.  The kids loved the pool and the breakfast (and the cookies!).  Staff was welcoming.  Very comfortable for our family.
Manager Response: Hi Christine J!  I want to thank you for your review on TripAdvisor.  We love it that you chose to stay with us at the Hampton Inn in Foothill Ranch for your family reunion/vacation!  We are happy that your kids enjoyed the pool, the breakfast and the cookies. I'm glad you found Hampton Inn Foothill Ranch easily accessible to shopping and restaurants and beach cities and you felt the staff was welcoming.  Please come back and see us again on your next vacation to Southern California.

Summary: Stay here for 6 days and the room is clean and helpful staff. Breakfast is nice with fresh fruit and drinks all day long.  Location is great and easy to access shopping malls and highway.  Will come back again for sure.
Manager Response: Hi David T!  Thank you for your review our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest here on TripAdvisor.  We are glad that you liked the location with easy access to highways and shopping and that you felt the room was clean and the staff was helpful.  I'm happy you enjoyed our breakfast variety as well as fresh fruit and water/coffee all day.  We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: Very statisfied with my stay at this hotel.  The complimentary breakfast is better than most.  The hotel staff is very accomodating, they treat you as a friend.  For my needs the location is ideal, and there is a nice choice of eating establishments near by.  I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Michael D W!  I am thrilled you were very satisfied with your stay at our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  Glad you enjoyed the wide selection of our complimentary breakfast and that you found our hotel staff was very accommodating. I like the added comment that you were treated as a friend. That is our goal at the Hampton Inn Irvine/Lake Forest- to have that personal touch with our guests.  I hope that the next time you are in this area, you will stay with us once again.

Summary: The staffs were amazing. Shout out to Ms. Chelsea (Front Desk) and Ms. Barbara (Breakfast). We'll definitely stay there again next time! The location is close to Anaheim (15 minutes). Just take Lake Forest road to I-5 and you're there...
Manager Response: Hi quochop!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  We are happy you enjoyed our family friendly atmosphere. We appreciate your shout outs to Barbara, our breakfast attendant, as well as Kelsey at the front desk.  They were both happy to see their names in your review.  I am happy you will stay with us again and look forward to your return.

Summary: The staffs were amazing. Shout out to Ms. Chelsea (Front Desk) and Ms. Barbara (Breakfast). We'll definitely stay there again next time! The location is close to Anaheim (15 minutes). Just take Lake Forest road to I-5 and you're there...
Manager Response: Hi Quochop L!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  Thank you for your kind comment about our amazing staff. We appreciate your shout outs to Barbara, our breakfast attendant, as well as Kelsey at the front desk.  They were both happy to see their names in your review.  We are happy you will stay with us again and look forward to your return.

Summary: This is a good basic hotel.  Everything works and the rooms are clean.  Prices are reasonable and they even have breakfast (not just a continental breakfast but a real honest to God breakfast).  I would definitely recommend this place.
Manager Response: Hi Hoang L! We appreciate you taking the time to write a review on our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  We are glad you found our hotel prices reasonable, everything worked and rooms were clean.  Happy you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast variety of hot and cold items and that you recommend the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest. Please stay with us again the next time you are in this area.

Summary: first of all, this Hampton Inn is well-located, just off the freeway and within walking distance of lots of shops & eating.  as is with many Hamptons, the hot breakfast is great, and the rooms are very clean (apparently Hampton Inns regularly launder the top blanket -- a huge plus!)  the pool & hot tub are clean and there are dedicated pool towels. however, what makes this is 5-star is the service of the staff.  every single person we encountered was friendly, helpful, and made us feel so welcome.  the man who staffed reception was very patient in making some room changes, and in providing us with a few odds and ends we needed.  Barbara, the hostess for the breakfast bar, was phenomenal!  it can be a really stressful and thankless job, especially when it's mobbed by weekenders,
Manager Response: Hi hadashi!  Thank you for your fantastic review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest. Glad you enjoyed our breakfast and you felt that the rooms, pool & hot tub were clean. We are so happy that you feel the service of our friendly, helpful and welcoming staff makes us a 5-star and a huge hit! Thank you for your kind comments regarding our patient front desk staff as well as Barbara, our breakfast attendant being phenomenal. She was so happy to see this review! Please come stay with us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary: The hotel is located immediately off the main highway where they just placed a toll road.  Surprise!  As we were driving from Anaheim, California all of a sudden we saw the fastlane tolls directly ahead of us and realized there were no turn offs or u-turns able to be made.  We are from out of state and had no idea about this new toll road and there was a sign almost a half mile from the tolls that said you must have their pass in order to use this toll road.  There were no other warnings and no place to turn around.  So, we had no choice to go through and then ask a State Policeman who was using radar to catch speeders what we should do.  He wasn't happy that we interrupted him, but told us to go the website on the highway sign and pay the one time tol.  What???  Upon arriving
Manager Response: Hi Teambono!  Thank you for writing a review of our hotel, the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  We are glad you found our hotel quiet with very large rooms.  The toll road is an alternate way to travel in this area but most mapquests/garmans show it as the fastest way. There are no cash plazas anymore on the toll roads but can be easily paid online at thetollroads.com. Payment must be done within 48 hours or they will issue a violation fine.  Thank you for your kind comment regarding Rick, our front desk clerk.  I'm glad he was able to help you figure it out.  Please stay with us again when you come out to Southern California in the future.

Summary: This was a family trip. I enjoyed every minute. Had clean room, nice pool, VERY friendly staff and the front desk persons were WONDERFUL and knowledgeable. Close to many good restaurants and shopping.
Manager Response: Hi Harry M!  Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  So happy you enjoyed your family trip and that you found your room clean, nice pool and felt our front desk people were wonderful and knowlegeable as well as our accessibility to many good restaurants and shopping.  We hope the next time you are in the area that you will once again stay with us.

Summary: My wife and I stayed at this hotel for 3 days while visiting Orange County, California.  We picked this location due to Hilton Honors point redemption.  The service of the staff is top notch. They are helpful without being intrusive.  They alway said hello, and were very cheerful in going about their duties.  The bed was VERY comfortable, the room was clean; would highly recommend this hotel if you have need of a hotel in this area.
Manager Response: Hi Chuck A!  We appreciate your kind review of the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  We are happy that you felt the beds were comfortable, the room was clean and especially that you felt the service of the staff was top notch.  Thank you for recommending our hotel and hope you will be back again the next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Stayed because the Team stayed here!
Summary: I usually stay at a Hilton but there was nothing wrong with staying here.  The bed was fine and the breakfast was fine.  I used the elliptical.  Front desk was fine.  The water in the front was nice. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi diningprincess!  We are so glad you gave the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest a try while visiting this area. We are glad you found everything nice-from the bed to the breakfast to the front desk.  So happy to hear that you would stay again with us and look forward to when you do come back to the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.

Summary: The Hampton in Foothill Ranch is fantastic. The staff are excellent at what they do and the breakfast is really good. Had a great time there recently. I'll be back. I used to live in Foothill Ranch and my wife and I always visit the area when we're in California. This was a perfect location to hit all the "old spots". Everything you want to do is close by.
Manager Response: Hi Barry B!  Thank you for this review on TripAdvisor for the Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  We are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you felt our staff was excellent and the breakfast was really good.  We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Better than average hotel in a pleasant area.
Summary: I stay at Hampton loyally because of the consistent quality and value I have experienced over the years.  This one is very nice and the plus was when sitting by the pool, the breakfast attendant brought out a pitcher of ice water with oranges cut up in it.  Very refreshing and totally unexpected!!  Kudos to her.  She should get a raise and the chain should implement this everywhere.  Great idea!!  lots of shopping, dining and other activities close by.  nice clean safe area.
Manager Response: Hi TY469!  Thank you for your kind review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest. Thank you for your comment about our breakfast attendant bringing you ice water by the pool.  I'm glad you enjoyed the "unexpected" treat and I will let her know how much you appreciated that!  Please come back and stay with us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary: As usual, my stay at a Hampton Inn was very satisfactory.  I would suggest this hotel to anyone looking for cleanliness,comfort, and service who is looking in the Mission Viejo area. I was checking out very early and I received a go-to bag for my breakfast. It had everything you needed for a good start.
Manager Response: Hi Sylvia K!  Thank you for your review of our Hampton Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I appreciate you recommending anyone looking for cleanliness, comfort and service in this area.  I'm glad you liked our "breakfast to go" bags that we offer Monday-Friday.  We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: A little pricy for a Hampton Inn.  Clean and well run.  The staff tries hard and is experienced.    The problem is the lack of a formal closet and the wardrobe does not allow pants to hang out.  As I said, reliable but not exciting - A Chevy
Manager Response: Hi David L!  We appreciate your review on this TripAdvisor site.  We are glad you found our hotel clean and well run with an experienced staff that tries hard which is our goal. Our hotel was not designed for formal closets but our wardrobe closets are in excellent shape and do hold a lot of clothes.  I like being compared to a Chevy as being reliable! We do hope you come and stay with us again.

Summary: Nice place for the price. Lots of easy parking, and great rates. Some things are dated, like the hair dryers and the carpets. But it seemed clean and was a bargain. Comes with the normal Hampton breakfast.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Hi TexasTravelette!  Thank you for reviewing our hotel as a nice place for the price with lots easy parking and great rates as well as clean.  We are anticipating our renovation in the near future.  We look forward to your return to our property.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay at Irvine
Summary: Hampton Inn is a small cozy place. It is a great place to stay especially if you have kids. The staff are wonderful and the place is not far from the attractions of OC. Great value for your money. The rooms are quiet and comfortable and the lobby is a great place to relax and have a coffee.
Manager Response: Hi Julio T!  Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We appreciate you mentioning our wonderful staff and great value for your money.  I'm glad you feel our rooms are quiet and comfortable and that our hotel is a great place to stay- especially with kids.  Please come back and stay with us again the next time you are in the area and tell your family and friends about us.

Summary: Great stay...especially for the rates and services. Offering a complimentary breakfast was great when traveling with a large group. I would certainly return to this hotel and I would certainly recommend this location to family and friends.
Manager Response: Hi Lalo D!  Thank you for taking the time to send a review of our hotel to TripAdvisor.  I'm so glad you had a great stay and enjoyed our complimentary breakfast.  We are very happy that you would return to our hotel in the future.  Thank you for recommending us to your family and friends.

Summary: Stayed for one night and staff was wonderful.  Like any hotel in So. Cal, price was a little high but got a very clean and quiet room.  Front desk staff was nice and helpful and warm, even taking time to sign up for rewards program.  Breakfast was good a little picked over but plenty of choices, and really something for everyone.  Hotel is close to many areas quickly and lots of nearby eating choices.
Manager Response: Hi Mike M!  Thank you for taking the time to send in a review of our hotel on TripAdvisor.  Thank you for complimenting our wonderful staff and finding the front desk staff nice, helpful and warm.  I'm glad you felt our breakfast had plenty of choices and, as you said, "something for everyone".  I'm excited for you to be joining our HHonors Rewards Program so you can build up points and earn a free night's stay in the future.  We hope that the next time you are in the area that you come and stay with us again.

Summary: I actually didn't stay at this hotel (my newly married daughter and her husband did).   However, I wanted to write a review of the excellent customer service I received over the phone trying to resolve a reservation issue based on a mistake my daughter had made.  Mike, the front desk staff, was patient, understanding, kind and helpful all three times I called him to try to figure out a solution to the problem.  I know he was very busy with guests every time I called, but he never made me feel like a nuisance and he ultimately found a solution to the problem, which made me, my daughter and her husband very happy!
Manager Response: Hi sallymander62!  Thank you for writing this review on TripAdvisor.  We are so happy you had a good experience with your reservation issue.  Glad that our front desk staff was able to resolve your issue and be patient, understanding, kind and helpful while doing it!  We hope your daughter and husband enjoyed their stay here.

Summary: We stayed for one night because we were participating in a 5k nearby. I was originally booked at the Hilton Garden across the parking lot but was able to change locations because I wanted breakfast included. Front desk guy was super friendly and let us change to a 1:00pm check out since we needed to get back and take a shower after the 5k. Hotel was quiet and clean.
Manager Response: Hi Janice S! Thank you for your review on the TripAdvisor site. We are glad you liked our friendly staff and that you felt our hotel was clean and quiet.  Hope you did well in the 5K that you participated in and that you come back and see us again soon when you are in the area.

Summary: My family of  stayed here while we were having construction done at hour home for 6 days.  We felt at home the entire week.  I cannot thank the staff enough for making our week as easy as can be!! I have never stayed at such a friendly hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you Amy H for your review here on TripAdvisor.  We were happy to be your "home away from home" for the week!  We are so happy you felt at home here and that you felt our staff was so friendly.  We hope everything went well with your construction and that you recommend your family and friends to stay here with us in the future.

Summary: Our three necessary items in a hotel are: clean, quiet and comfortable. This Hampton meets all of those, but then goes beyond. The staff was extremely accommodating, the beds and pillows made for an excellent night's sleep and the breakfast hostess was outstanding. If we ever need another hotel in this area, we shall definitely return to this Hampton Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you beachmeisters for your great review on this Trip Advisor site.  We are happy we met your every expectation with our clean and quiet hotel as well as exceeding your expectations with our accommodating staff and comfortable beds, giving you a great night's sleep! We do hope you come back to the area and stay with us again.

Summary: We had a great stay at the Hampton Inn.  It was convenient to family and entertainment venues in Orange County.  It was clean, quiet, and staff was friendly and efficient.  Warning though to infrequent visitors from out of state - this hotel sits on a tollroad.  CA has changed access to this tollroad as of May 14, 2014.  You will need to set up an online account.  They will no longer have booths that take cash.
Manager Response: Thank you Carol K for your review.  We are happy you had a great stay with us and that you felt our hotel was clean, quiet, and our staff was friendly and efficient. We hope you come back to our hotel soon. You brought up a good point about the toll road change.  My suggestion for our future guests is to use the option "avoid toll ways" on any GPS systems.  We are not far from the major highway and getting around once you are at the hotel is easy without using the toll road.

Summary: We stay at this hotel at least 4 times a year and love it. The staff is wonderful and Barbara that prepares the breakfast is the best. I love making my own waffles. And the mountain view is just beautiful. If you are looking for a hotel in the Irvine area, this hotel in the Foothill Ranch area is a great place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you traveldoctor3 for your comments about out wonderful hotel and staff.  We appreciate your observations about the staff and knowing how you enjoyed your breakfast and making your own waffles!  We will continue to strive to meet or exceed your expectations for your future stays.  We look forward to serving you again.

Summary: The Hampton in at Lake Forest served as home base for our travels in SoCal.  Lake Forest is a newer, very clean area to stay and this Hampton Inn fit right in with that description.  The staff was very friendly and accomodating.
Manager Response: Thanks ToddB for your great comments about our hotel!  We are glad you recognized our staff in your review for being very friendly and accommodating and noticed how centrally located we are for all the southern Orange County activities.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: This hotel is in a great location.  Not too far from any of the major attractions.   It is very well kept and very clean.  The morning breakfast was very good with a lot of variety.  The staff is more then helpful and very courteous.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi Colletteev762!  Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We are happy that you felt the hotel was well kept and clean and that the staff was helpful and courteous.  We are glad you enjoyed our breakfast variety as well.  We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, Good Location, Amazing Staff
Summary: Great Location- Close to Irvine Spectrum/ Also quite a few shopping centers in the Area, Target, Denny's, Restaurants , and more. Great Front Desk , Very Professional and helpful and they go out of there way to make sure you stay is the best. My room nestled by the elevator/ I did not hear any noise coming from the elevator. Rooms provide great amenities / Fridge/ Coffee Maker and Free internet / Bed are great and super soft one of the best nights sleep I've had in awhile.  In the morning they provide a great breakfast- which gets your morning started.   I would highly recommend this to anyone who is staying in the Irvine area.   Forgot to add this location is close to the Train Station.
Manager Response: Hi MattSuper!  Thank you for reviewing our hotel on the TripAdvisor site.  We are thrilled that you liked the location and breakfast.  Thank you for your comments about our staff being professional, helpful, and going out of their way to make sure your stay was the best as well. Also glad to hear you had a good night sleep in our comfortable beds.  We hope you come back and stay with us again.

Summary: This is a clean and well run property; consistent with the standards in place as most Hampton Inns.  I've stayed here previously and would come back again.  The staff are friendly and the beds very comfortable.  There is ample and convenient free parking steps from the entry to the hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Tony F.!  Thank you for your review on the TripAdvisor site.  We are happy that you feel the staff is friendly and the beds are comfortable.  We appreciate your comment about the cleanliness of our property and how it is well run.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: The staff was helpful, friendly and efficient.  The rooms were very nice and quiet.  The breakfast was very nice and the warm cookies. coffee and fruit in the afternoon was great.  Everyone seemed happy to be there.
Manager Response: Hi Timothy B.!  Thank you for sharing your review on the TripAdvisor site.  We are happy that you found the staff helpful, friendly and efficient.  People like you help keep our staff happy to be here!

Summary: We have traveled all over the US for business and plea sure both.We always stay at Hampton Inn wherever we go.  It is consistently good. They have comfortable, clean rooms, a friendly staff and they offer a good breakfast. The value for the price cannot be beat!
Manager Response: Hi James M!  Thank you for your business.  We are happy that you find the Hampton hotels consistant and that ours was added to your list.  We look forward to your return in the future.

Summary Heading: great location, excellent, clean and quiet!
Summary: This hotel is right off a toll road in california... we were going to a wedding and needed something close, clean and useful. we checked in early (they were totally nice about that) got in, got dressed, headed to wedding, the hotel was super nice and cozy and close to food, coffee.. the stuff you need in a hurry on the way to an evening wedding...  check in was easy, check out painless, great, safe parking and off we went!
Manager Response: Hi Randal P.  We are happy you enjoyed the hotel and that it was a good location for you.  We are glad you had a great experience and for sharing it with the TripAdvisor site.

Summary Heading: A good place to stay in Orange County
Summary: The hotel is comfortable, the staff is friendly, the breakfast is varied and tasty.  It's centrally located in Orange County which makes it easy to get around.  We have stayed here many times and have not been disappointed.
Manager Response: Hi Judy Helmetta!  Thank you for reviewing our hotel.  We are happy that you enjoyed the location, staff, and our breakfast variety.  We are grateful for your repeat business and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: My room was next to the first floor exit.  People continuously entered and exited for the purposes of smoking just outside of the door.  To avoid having to utilize a key to re-enter the smokers would prop the door open which would then allow thier smoke to enter my room making you feel like you were sleeping in a smoke filled barroom, rather than a hotel
Manager Response: Hi Wayne T!  Thank you for taking the time to write this review.  We are sad that other guests didn't have the courtesy to close the exit door while smoking outside of our non-smoking hotel and ruined your experience with us.  Please give us another try in the future and we will make sure that won't happen again.  We want your next experience to a much happier one!

Summary: hotel staff were great hotel was clean the pool was clean and the exterior was clean and fresh.  the location of the hotel was perfect for myself  close to other options for eating.  will stay at this hotel again. the breakfast was great  the cookies they leave out all day were great also.
Manager Response: Hi pestypest!  Thank you for your wonderful review concerning our property!  We are happy you liked the location, the staff, the clean pool and exterior, the breakfast and especially the cookies.  We look forward to your return visit with us.

Summary: Based on our experiences, you can't go wrong when you stay in Hilton family of hotels... we love staying in Hampton because of their service quality, hospitability and accomodation. They're continental breakfast is good too.
Manager Response: Hi Baby Gloria L!  Thank you for your review of Hampton properties.  We are happy that you love staying in Hamptons and that you enjoy our continental breakfast.  We look forward to your return in the future.

Summary: The hotel goes beyond to accommodate their clientele from the pre-registration experience all the way to checkout.  The hotel from lobby to rooms were extremely clean and comfortable, the breakfast was impressive.  We were a large group of families (26 rooms) or a sporting event and there was not a single complaint...and that's pretty hard to do!  On the contrary, everyone was very impressed.  Great job, Hampton Inn.  We will return.
Manager Response: Hi Zach G.!  Thank you for your wonderful review concerning our hotel! We are happy you enjoyed your stay from start to finish and that you felt our hotel was clean and our breakfast impressive.  We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: For the business traveler this is an excellent venue, with a terrific staff, free internet and parking and a welcoming, warm breakfast.  The hotel is very clean, tastefully decorated and always feels like new.
Manager Response: Hi John S.,  Thank you for your review for the business traveler. We are happy you found our staff terrific and hotel very clean.  We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: First time staying at a Hampton, just needed a place to stay for the night near our cheerleading competition, and it was great that it came with breaksfast to help our cheerleader start her busy day well fed. Very nice hotel, staff was friendly and helpful, the rooms were clean and roomy, and the complimentary breaksfast was great. Plenty of choices to suit all of us in the family.
Manager Response: Hi Holly B.,  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for choosing our hotel and for sharing your thoughts.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: First of all, I don't know how old this property is but it is need of a major renovation.  This hotel looks like it is 15-20 years old and has never seen new carpet or furniture.  There are knicks and scratches on all wood surfaces from lobby to elevator to room.  The microwave in the room is so old it has dials to operate it.    When I went up to my room, my keys did not work.  Not a big deal, I know it happens.  But when I went back down to get new keys, Tom at the desk insisted he come upstairs with me to ensure my keys worked.  The new keys worked, but as I entered my room he asked me to cocktails with "everyone" (I don't know whom everyone is since he was the only staff on property).    My room was disgusting!  There was what looked like ash in my bathroom sink and hairs in
Manager Response: Hi KayC503,   We wanted to thank you for taking the opportunity to share your thoughts. We greatly appreciate the feedback and apologize for not creating a better experience for you. We have taken action and also talked to you personally.  Please feel free to call if you have any other questions.

Summary: This hotel was a pleasant stay and was very convenient to my business location.  Rick at the desk was very friendly and even mentioned the elevator light was out at the ground floor but to be assured it was still summoned.  The light was fixed the next day.  Breakfast was great with a big variety hot and cold and particularly enjoyed the daily fresh fruit and cookies too.  The hotel is near restaurants and other shopping and convenient access to a toll road although I did not need to use it.   There is good access directly down the hill to I405 only about 5 miles away.
Manager Response: Hey Robert H! Thank you so much for taking the time to give other travelers a synopsis about your experience with our team. We look forward to your next visit and thank you greatly for your loyalty!  Cheers, Hampton Inn Team

Summary: Great cookies and refreshments when we arrived.  Very clean lobby and helpful staff.  Centrally located to great restaurants in varying price ranges, stores, movie theaters and parks.  We were pleasantly surprised by the experience and will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi Vivian D!  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your business and sharing your experience with the TripAdvisor site!  Cheers! Hampton Inn Team

Summary: Great home away from home while travelling.  Comfortable rooms, friendly staff.  The breakfast buffet is wonderful as is the "breakfast lady", Barbara, who makes you feel so welcome.  The people at the Hampton always treat their customers to freshly baked, very yummy cookies in the afternoons.  We have enjoyed staying their for many years during the holiday time when we come to visit our family in the area.
Manager Response: Hi Gary,  Thank you for taking an opportunity to share your experience. We are so pleased to know you enjoyed your stay but especially excited to know that Barbara (and our cookies!) made a positive impact on your stay. We look forward to serving you again in the near future!  Sincerely, Hampton Inn Team

Summary Heading: Just what we needed with very friendly staff.
Summary: Our family stayed there New Years Eve after our trip to Disneyland. The hotel staff knew we were coming in late and kindly allowed us to have a later check out. Del was exceptionally kind and helpful. Everyone was very nice. The hotel was clean and comfortable. We didn't take advantage of the breakfast, but they had coffee and water out for guests at all hours along with fresh fruit. The only reason I gave it a very good rating is because of a few housekeeping issues. The elevator carpet was pretty dirty (maybe a little nitpicky) and there was a smear of something on the bathroom wall near the trash can. (Not sure if it was rust or maybe some female missed the trash can when disposing of feminine products). Either way it needed to be wiped but could have easily been overlooked.
Manager Response: Hi SoloGirlTravels!  Our team here would like to thank you for choosing our hotel for your accommodation needs; we greatly appreciate your business. We are pleased to know that your stay was safe, clean and enjoyable. I apologize for the minor mishap, rest assure this problem has been addressed. We look forward to seeing you soon!  Sincerely, Hampton Inn Team

Summary: I have always enjoyed staying at the Hampton Inn.  The staff will always take the extra step to make sure your stay is wonderful.  I also enjoy the great breakfast that comes along with the stay.  I have stayed at many different Hampton Inns and each time the staff will have a smile on their face and are very friendly.
