Manager Response: Hi Michael N!  Thank you for taking your time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. Us and other travelers appreciate the positive feedback you've shared. We're always seeking feedback to make the best possible stay, so thank you for that. We look forward to seeing you soon!  Sincerely, Hampton Inn Team

Summary: I have not stayed in a more under staffed Hampton Inn. This hotel is NOT up to Hampton Standards in anyway! I am surprised they still have their Flag. Breakfast is sad. Same scrambled egss for an entire week. The poor breakfast person can't keep up. The housekeepers are lazy. Making a bed to them is pulling the duvet up and calling it made. I really could go on and on..and I will stop there. Hilton will be hearing from me. The staff is overly friendly. I guess they are trying to do a dog and pony show so you won't look around and notice the substandard conditions of the Hampton.
Manager Response: Hi Jaime S! So sorry for the delayed response, but we wanted to thank you for taking the opportunity to share your thoughts. We greatly appreciate the feedback and apologize for not creating a better experience for you.  We will take your feedback and learn from it, you can count on us!  Sincerely, Hampton Inn Team

Summary: If you read my posts, then you will know that I believe what makes a for a great hotel stay is the quality of the people working at the hotel. From the time we were greeted upon entering the lobby by Tom Gitzinger until we departed, this front desk employee was cheerful, friendly and informative about the area surrounding the hotel. Our 3rd floor room was clean, spacious and quiet and the king sized bed was clean and smelled freah as a daisy.Although we were staying during a busy holiday weekend, the staff including front desk,housekeeping and the woman who provides the breakfast(clean and well stocked) everyone person we spoke with was pleasant and tried to be helpful. I would highly recommend this Hampton Inn for anyone staing in the Irvine area of Orange County for eiother
Manager Response: Hey there Doit4fun01!!  Thank you so much for taking the opportunity to share your experience with us. We are pleased to know that you had a great stay with us. We work hard to keep the hotel clean, smelling fresh and full of smiles for our guests; we are proud that we met that expectation! Looking forward to having you again!  Sincerely, Hampton Inn Team

Summary Heading: Yet Another Great Stay at a Hampton Inn!
Summary: Could not have been happier with our stay.  Clean, comfortable, quiet room.  Friendly staff.  If we had not had other plans, we definitely would have indulged in the comp breakfast.  Lots to choose from and looked very fresh.
Manager Response: Hey Camred! We are so happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us and other travelers. We look forward to taking great care of you again!  Sincerely, Hampton Inn Team

Summary: Very quiet Hotel; comfortable bed, great breakfast included in price. Three stories, swimming pool, small parking lot and lots of street parking. Friendly staff; close to shopping center and lots of restaurants and fast food places.
Manager Response: Hi Sleepfreak!  Thank you so much for such a positive review on our hotel! We are happy to have such a great team, clean and quiet rooms all conveniently located to several restaurants for our guests. We hope to see you again in the future!   Sincerely, Hampton Inn Team

Summary: Love this hotel. Betty, the lady that takes care of the Breakfast room is the best of any Hampton we have stayed at. The hotel is in a beautiful setting at the base of the hills in Orange County. This is a very quiet location and there are lots of places to eat with in a mile of the hotel. The hotel front desk staff are very friendly and always wanting to help. I recommend this hotel very highly!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn at Mission Viejo, CA
Summary: Staff, great.  Service, great. Cleanliness great. Everything was excellent.  We went to Swim Meet at Lake Forest, CA, the Turkey Classis.  My son is in Copley Swim Team.  Others on team recommended the Hampton Inn they had staying there before, this was our first time.  My mom, 3 kids, ages 6, 9, & 11 & I went.  My mom has cancer fourth stage, going thru chemo therapy, very hard on her but everything at Hampton Inn were great, made her feel very comfortable, she really enjoyed herself.  The kids loved the pool, internet & cable tv.  Service, staff, attention is excellent.  We will love to always stay at a Hampton Inn on our trips. Laura Bahena & Family
Manager Response: none

Summary: I usually stay at Hilton, but Hampton Inn is great.  They have attractive rooms, complimentary internet, and the most comfortable bedding of any hotel I've stayed.  The free breakfast is great too.  If you are traveling for business or pleasure check out Hampton Inn.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Over all good,  comp breakfast not excellent b any means.  Eggs were dry, no taste  Rooms are excellent, staff excellent, parking is great.  A little of the beat and path.  Requiring 200 characters as a minimum for this review is not a good thing,  to much said is to much said.  You don't have to say a lot to get your point across.  Would stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beside Barbara "breakfast prepare"( she should not mass with client) my experience where very good. Mr. Tom was the person that for me was the one in service and client attendance. over all it was a nice stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were Very Happy with the whole experience.  The staff were Wonderful.  Very friendly and helpful.  We were recognized whenever we came into the hotel.  We were t here for a wedding and the staff remembered and asked about how it went. You felt like they were really interested in you.   I would definitely recommend this Hampton
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were in town for the weekend and needed an inexpensive place to stay that was reasonably nice.  This hotel met our needs.  It was clean and relative new (or at least well-kept).  It's basically in a business area but not too far from restaurants and shopping.  We'd stay here again if we are in the area but we definitely would not eat the breakfast.  It was very disappointing...probably more so because it was "oversold" upon check-in.  It's basic continental fare with some powdered eggs and waffles. I though the waffles would be relatively safe but they were chewy.  Go elsewhere for breakfast unless you want yogurt or cereal.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay on a budget
Summary: I was visiting Huntington Beach, CA and need to find a hotel that was not too far but had a few things mainly free parking (it was $12-15 at locations closer to Huntington Beach) and a free breakfast in the morning. This hotel fit the bill. I was also pleased with the room and selection of channels on the TV. This hotel is probably more of a business type hotel than a family one because of the small pool etc.  Our stay was comfortable. There is a Starbucks nearby.

Summary: I have stayed at this property many times over the last several years on business trips.  It's always clean, solid service, nice lobby with breakfast, nice fruit, coffee, etc.  Always stay here on my trips to the OC.

Summary: I don't often stay at Hamptons because they're a little upscale for me. I'm more of a Motel6 kinda guy when I'm on my own but this motel was the closest to the start of a sporting event so I went with it.  I always thought Hamptons were expensive but even in Orange County, which isn't cheap, this Hampton was reasonably priced (< $100). The motel has a lot of features I appreciated like excellent staff, large public areas, above average breakfast, coffee and fruit all day, microwave, fridge, nice TV, in-room coffee maker, free WiFi, and a guest computer in the lobby.  One thing I hadn't seen before was a lap tray on the bed as I entered the room with channel guide and remote on it - nice touch. Beds were very comfy and the facility was very quiet. Summary: Service was friendly. The room (202?) was comfortable and clean but a little noisey on Saturday night. We went to a bible conference around the corner from this hotel so for us the location was great. Small fitness room with only one treadmill and one stair stepper. I recommend Koto Sushi (45 Auto Center Dr.) It was too cold for swimming but the pool looked inviting.

Summary: I usually like Hampton Inn, and I found this one to be okay . . . nothing special.  We stayed here three nights/four days as we were in the Laguna area to help a sick friend.  Our check-in was quick, and the clerk was very nice.  Like the other staff members with whom we had any contact, he was always smiling and always took the time to say, "Hello" or "See you soon." (when we left).  I thought that was very nice.  Except for the bed linens, the room seemed a bit worn.  Grout was missing in the bathroom, and some of the wall paper was puckered and peeling. The carpet was clean but worn.  Because we had 2 queen beds, the room seemed cramped.  The AC kept going on and off and on and off, and that woudn't be bad except that it disturbed our sleep. Summary Heading: Night staff made out whole stay......
Summary: My husband and I are very happy with the way the night shift handled our confusion with the hotel next door. I come from the Hilton and would recommend this Hotel due to its staff 100%. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Great value and super friendly staff
Summary: We stayed here for a few nights while some work was done at our house.  We stayed at a Hampton Inn last Summer while driving through Ohio and the experience was very nice and we expected the same.  We were not disappointed.  Everyone was super nice, including the guys installing new carpet in the hallway.  The daily breakfast was quite good with a wide variety of items (even a to-go bag if we were running late).  The hotel was very clean - even the pool - and comfortable.  It is conveniently located and priced lower than most of the others in the area.  The mini frig and microwave in room were handy.  The only improvement I would like to see is higher end televisions in the room.  I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your genorous and thoughtful comments.  We sincerely appreciate your patience during the work that was taking place at our hotel.  We also wanted to inform you that we are receiving the upgraded televisions you mentioned in the upcoming month.  We look forward to serving you again in the future.   Sincerely,  John Mathews

Summary: We stayed here to attend my neices wedding in Laguna Beach.  We also wanted to do the Disneyland tourist thing as well.  This hotel is about 20 minutes from Disneyland and way cheaper then the Disney hotels.  Close to the beach as well.  Staff was friendly, breakfast area was clean and rooms were always clean when we returned at the end of the day. Several places to dine nearby in the evening. This hotel is definetly living up to Hampton Standards. Would stay again for sure!

Summary: Room is decent, daily turn down service is nice, fresh towels everyday. Breakfast is decent and convenient, staff is friendly. Internet needs a bit of work, extremely low bandwidth and very unstable connectability. Parking was ample, never had a long walk to the hotel even late at night. Location was great, could not have been happier with that. Over all I like the hotel but since I was here for a school, I had training videos to watch as homework and was unable to do so because of the connection. So when I come back out in a few months I may have to pick somewhere else, but that would be the only reason I would.

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel.  We were on a family vacation and enjoyed our 3 night stay.  The room was clean and neatly decorated.  The bed was comfortable.  You feel pampered with all the amenities offered. A decent hot breakfast every morning.  Great pool and jacuzzi.  This hotel is located in a quiet corporate area with lots of eateries nearby, locate just minutes from Laguna Beach, San Juan Capistrano, and other Orange County attractions.  Although the Freeway is close, noise was not a factor.  This freeway is a toll road, and is a pain having to pay coming and going (we found an alternate route). We will definitely stay here again.

Summary: The hotel is quite comfortable, the rooms clean. The rooms are spacious, including the bathrooms. Free Wi-Fi.  This is your standard, to-be-expected hotel chain. It was too cold to enjoy the pool, but the lobby area is nice with lots of meeting room area for talking.  The breakfast is nice with sausage, egg "patties", your standard pastries and baked goods, yogurt, and fruit. The coffee is available 24 HOURS a day!  The location is central with many of the local attractions close by. Although I've never stayed in the next door Hilton Garden Inn, I would probably stay here again since there is the free breakfast, coffee, and the cheaper price.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a cheap price
Summary: Another great stay  This hotel is very clean and the check in process took about 30 seconds. I'm a hilton honors gold card member and I have stayed at this hotel 10-15 times in the last few years. If you have a choice make sure you pick this hotel over the hilton garden inn right next door. The garden inn is does not offer free breakfast the haptton inn does. The hampton inn always has clean rooms and the best beds the best in the hotel industry. Make sure your book through hilton's web site you will get the best price. Use your AAA card and you will get a better discount on your room.

Summary: I am a frequent traveler with Hilton and before my recent stay I had never stayed at a Hampton Inn. I am rather picky about the hotels I choose to stay at and Hampton Inns have never attracted me. However, this property was very close to where I wanted to be and was cheaper then the neighboring Hilton Garden Inn so I decided to try it.   I was amazed at the quality of the room, service, and comfort that usually only four/five star hotels provide. The hotel is obviously very new (you can smell the scent of new carpet/wallpaper throughout the hotel). Check-in was less than 30 seconds, the hotel was spotless, the bed was very comfortable (I am almost tempted to buy the same mattress for myself) and the front desk was very helpful and friendly. Summary: We stayed here because we had our return flight out of John Wayne Airport. It was very easy to get to the airport from this Hampton Inn. The rooms were very clean.  The bedspreads were dark and made the room seem old upon entering.  The breakfast was excellent.  They had hot and cold cereals, sausage and biscuits and scrambled eggs.  They also had a nice bowl of fresh prepared fruit and a basket with a choice of apples or bananas.   These stayed out all day long. You also had a choice of a couple of varieties of Yoplait Yogurt.   You can also get coffee, hot tea or hot chocolate all day.  The breakfast area was well kept and the cook came out often to check on the food, and replenish items.    We stayed two nights there and both nights the jets on the hot tub were not working.
